title: Senior Backend Engineer
description:
Rain is the fastest-growing earned wage access (EWA) fintech in the U.S. , serving 2.5 million employees and backed by top investors like QED and Prosus . We‚Äôve raised nearly $400M in funding‚Äîincluding the largest Series A in fintech history ‚Äîand just closed our Series B to fuel our next stage of hypergrowth .


We are looking for a Backend Software Engineer that must have some Golang experience. This position is remote. The candidate will be responsible for managing various areas of our backend platform, including API integrations with 3rd-party vendors and partners.


As a Backend Engineer with our User Tribe you will play a central role in making it easier for users to access Rain and build products that help users maintain positive cash availability. You will work with our international product and engineering teams to manage a robust digital wallet that enables users to transact through seamless account creation and frictionless employer linking. Our ideal candidate is excited to tackle tough technical challenges and looking for opportunities to contribute to our strategic thinking.


Responsibilities:

title: Python Developer
description:
Required Skills & Experience

- 7 years of backend development experience

- Experience with pyspark and python for code transformation

- Strong SQL coding experience

- Experience working with a US based company


Nice to Have Skills & Experience

- Palantir Foundry experience

- Code optimization experience

- Math or Statistics background or degree

- JavaScript or TypeScript training courses


Job Description

Insight Global is looking for a backend developer to join the analytics organization at a global health solutions company. This candidate will be joining a development team that is focused on optimization and creating decision based databases. The day to day will consist of 80% core development in Pyspark and Python and 20% of the time will be spent in team meetings and working with business stakeholders. The technologies within the teams space are: Palantir foundry, data bricks and tableau. This resource will be focused on backend development in pyspark.

title: Senior Product Designer
description:
Company

  • Mural Group is working with an early stage, U.S. based SaaS company building software solutions for U.S. senior living communities.
  • The team is roughly 15 people located across the U.S. and LatAm.
  • The leadership team is made up of strong leaders with experience at premier startups.


The Role

  • You will define and lead the design experiences across three core products--web and mobile.
  • You will take ideas from concept to completion.
  • Conduct and manage full research process from planning and scheduling to execution and synthesis.
  • You'll lead usability testing sessions, gather feedback and information to vet and refine designs.
  • This role requires a strong bias for action and scrappy attitude toward the product development process--flexibility and willingness to pivot are keys to success in this fast paced environment.
  • You will work closely with engineers to ensure designs are feasible, scope appropriately, and account for edge cases and error states.
  • Your ability to communicate effectively and collaborate is crucial.
  • Help establish and maintain a consistent design language and component library.
  • Contribute to the overall brand experience--create and maintain brand and marketing materials.


Qualifications

  • A minimum of 4 years of experience in Product/UX Design.
  • Fluent in English.
  • First and foremost, you are a problem solver and learner and you have good taste in visual design.
  • Strong portfolio with concrete examples of designing and shipping complex web or mobile interfaces.
  • Strong proficiency with Figma with ability to translate requirements and ideas into simple design solutions.
  • Experience designing for similar users preferred (Nurses, Senior Care Professionals)


Work Expectations

The team is distributed, but generally located in North and South America (United States and Brazil). Work hours are flexible, but there are regular meetings you'll be expected to attend. The expectation is to be available to collaborate during general daytime hours. The team relies heavily on Figma, Slack, Linear and Notion for collaboration.


Though the role is full-time, you will be paid as a contractor. To enable this the company will work with individuals who already have a company set up in Brazil or the company will help you set up your company in order to be compensated.


Interview Process

  • Please apply with your LinkedIn profile and/or resume. Please include a portfolio link.
  • Asynchronous portfolio review: Create a 15 minute video walking through a relevant project that demonstrates your skills and experience related to the role.
  • Project: Spend 2 hours on a small project. You will be given product context and asked to come up with low fidelity designs for a user experience that would address the problem. You will present your project during a 1-hour interview with leadership.
  • 1-2 additional follow-up 1:1s with the founder and/or Head of Engineering my be requested to address unresolved questions.

title: College-Level Chemistry Tutor
description:
We are looking for tutors to solve college-level Chemistry questions in English. These questions are submitted by students, who expect a response in less than 24 hours.


Tutors in this project work in freelance mode and can decide the number of hours they wish to work.


Do you prefer to work in the morning, in the evening, for a few hours or many hours? The choice is yours. You can log in at any time to help students. In addition, you can work from anywhere, as long as you have a computer with a reliable Internet connection.


We need tutors who can start immediately!


Characteristics


Payment in dollars.

Type of contract: freelance/self-employed.

Schedule: Flexible, free choice

Start: Immediate

Duration: Indefinite


Requirements


  • Ability to solve university-level questions in at least one of the following subjects:
  • General Chemistry
  • Organic Chemistry
  • Student or graduate of a university course whose curriculum includes at least one of the subjects listed in the previous point.
  • Computer with an Internet connection.
  • No criminal record.


About LatinHire


Founded in 2003, LatinHire is a company specialising in managing teams of experts for distance learning institutions. Its clients include some of the world's most prestigious education startups.

title: Lead Front-end Engineer | ReactJS
description:
About Us

Smarter Contact is a fast-growing SaaS with a text and voice messaging communications platform enhanced with AI technologies, serving real estate professionals in the US market. We're the real estate market leader, and we're always looking for performance-driven team members to join our growing team.


The role

We are looking for a very experienced Front End Developer to transform our front end into a high-quality, scalable, and maintainable solution.


You'll join our engineering team to architect and implement robust, performant React components that deliver exceptional user experiences with our product. You'll collaborate with product, design, and backend teams to build features that help businesses meaningfully connect with their customers.


Qualifications:

  • 8+ years of professional software development experience with at least 5 years focused on front-end technologies
  • Proven track record building and maintaining production React apps at scale
  • Deep understanding of modern JavaScript (ES6+) and TypeScript
  • Expert knowledge of React hooks, context API, and state management solutions
  • Mastery of component library development and UI/UX implementation


Technical Requirements:

  • Advanced proficiency in React.js with demonstrated experience building complex applications
  • Strong expertise with Chakra UI component library and design systems
  • Experience with Vite build tooling and modern front-end optimization techniques
  • Proven knowledge with Sentry error monitoring and performance tracking
  • Experience with CI/CD workflows using GitHub Actions and GCP Cloud Build
  • In-depth knowledge of GraphQL client implementations (Apollo or similar), including codegen
  • Hands on experience with architecture patterns like Feature Sliced Design (FSD)
  • Strong understanding of web performance optimization and responsive design principles
  • Experience working in highly collaborative Agile development environments


Nice to Have:

  • Prior experience in the messaging space
  • Worked for a fast moving startup
  • Experience with React Native


We are looking for the BEST that want to be part of a fast growing company that is set to take off. If you meet ALL of the qualifications, we can't wait to hear from you.

title: Entrepreneur's Sales Apprentice Internship
description:
Role Description

Successful entrepreneur Will Christensen is looking for an entrepreneur's apprentice, specifically someone who is interested in learning the ropes and understanding what it takes to actually build a business. He and his entrepreneurial peers have more ideas that he can possibly execute on their own and he is looking for an entrepreneur's apprentice who can be guided on a weekly basis on how to build a business from the ground up. All opportunities are paid and some have equity options.


Please note that many of these businesses that are being formed require heavy work in sales for the first 3 to 6 months. This doesn't mean you'll be a full-time salesperson locked into that role forever but it does mean that you'll be doing hands-on guided business development and selling while learning what it takes to build leads and sales from nothing.


This is a remote contract role as an Entrepreneur's Sales Apprentice at Equity Hammer. The Sales Apprentice will be involved in day-to-day sales activities, learning about sales strategies, and customer interactions, and assisting in sales campaigns to support the growth of startup clients.


Company Description


Equity Hammer is the holding company for Entrepreneur's Apprentice, based in Utah, offering remote consulting and matchmaking services to Entrepreneurs. We change the lives of young and experienced entrepreneurs creating matched pairs to save the drowning and expand the young.


Our focus is to clone busy entrepreneurs who need more help. We find extra sets of hands that expand an Entrepreneurs' bandwidth and change the lives of young entrepreneurs in the process.


Qualifications

  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
  • Strong organizational and time management skills
  • Passion for Entrepreneurship and Business
  • Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a remote setting
  • Pursuing a degree in Business, Marketing, or entrepreneurial related field
  • Willingness to Learn Sales, Marketing, and Business Development skills.


Where: Remote

Time Commitment: 15-25 Hours Per Week Minimum

Duration: Typically 12 Months

title: Senior Researcher - Biomarkers
description:
We are currently seeking Editorial Board Members for "The Open Biomarkers Journal"


We are seeking experienced researchers and scientists to join us as Editorial Board Members for the journal, "The Open Biomarkers Journal" .


About the Role:

Actively contribute to the development and growth of the journal by providing valuable scholarly input, including the selection of topics, reviewers, and authors.

Contribute/solicit Special Thematic Issues on a trending topic (one thematic issue every year).

Review articles submitted to the journal (at least thrice a year) in your area of expertise.


Requirements:

Scientist or researcher (PhD) with experience in biomarkers in clinical, medical, and pharmaceutical research, and related subject areas.

At least 5 years of experience in peer-reviewing, editing, and writing research papers.

Verifiable record of publications in peer-reviewed journals indexed in WOS Core Collection and/or Scopus.

Ability to communicate clearly and timely with stakeholders in the English language.


Benefits:

Save APCs on publishing your research

As an Editorial Board Member, you will be entitled to publish your papers and thematic issues, free of cost.


Keep tabs on the latest research

Editorial Board Members will be able to access and review new research/review papers as they are submitted to the journal, allowing them to keep abreast of the latest trends in biomarkers in clinical, medical, and pharmaceutical research, and related subject areas.


Network with a community of scholars

You will be able to connect with professionals, scholars, and experts on our editorial board, opening new opportunities to collaborate on novel research projects and broaden your perspective in the field.


About the Journal:

The Open Biomarkers Journal is an open-access journal that publishes research articles, reviews/mini-reviews, letters, and guest-edited single-topic issues on biomarkers in clinical, medical, and pharmaceutical research. The coverage includes biomarkers of disease, new biomarkers, and exposure to drugs, genetic effects, and applications of biomarkers.


The Open Biomarkers Journal , a peer-reviewed journal, is an important and reliable source of current information on the developments in the field. Emphasis is placed on publishing quality papers, making them freely available to researchers worldwide.

title: Business Development Manager - Outbound Tourism
description:
Gecko Travel Recruitment are working with a leading Travel Business. They are seeking a Business Development Manager to grow inbound group travel to the UK, Ireland, and the Nordics from the Brazilian market.


The Role:

You'll develop new business opportunities across Brazil, targeting leisure, student, and religious group travel. Responsibilities include building a strong client base, preparing tailored proposals, managing the full sales cycle, and representing the company at trade events.


You Will Have:

‚Ä¢ Sales and business development experience in travel

‚Ä¢ Strong commercial acumen and client-handling skills

‚Ä¢ Experience with group travel to the UK, Ireland, or Nordics

‚Ä¢ Full sales cycle management skills

‚Ä¢ Proficiency with CRM and Microsoft Office

‚Ä¢ Self-starter mindset and remote work discipline

‚Ä¢ Portuguese fluency; additional languages a plus


Additional Information:

‚Ä¢ Fully remote, Based in Brazil

‚Ä¢ Salary $90,000

‚Ä¢ Familiarisation trips and travel discounts

‚Ä¢ Additional leave for birthday and volunteering

‚Ä¢ Gym contribution and wellbeing support

‚Ä¢ Clear career development path in an international team


If you're ready to take the next step in your travel career with a company that values both global impact and individual contribution, we'd love to hear from you.


Apply with your CV quoting GTR1730 or visit:


If you don't hear from us within 7 days, unfortunately your application hasn't been successful this time.

title: CRM Consultant
description:
We are currently looking for a Techno-functional Architect within Dynamics 365 to support our biggest client remotely in Brazil


This is a challenging role which involves consulting and engineering with key players in Latin America's various markets.


If you think you are the right person to undertake this challenge you will need:

Minimum Requirements:


  • Extensive techno-functional experience within Dynamics 365
  • Extensive Experience in Power Platforms and Power Apps integrations with Dynamics 365
  • Extensive experience within Gap Analysis and requirements gathering
  • Knowledge of Success by Design methodology
  • Extensive experience with orchestrating project progress by engaging with senior stakeholders.
  • Proven track record of adapting methodology and applying governance to identify, communicate, and minimize business and technical risks.


Responsibilities:


  • Customer facing consultations and hands on in various domains (retail, government, banking)
  • Hosting advanced workshops for client teams (practical & theory)


If you possess in depth knowledge and hands on experience in the above subjects then this could be the next big step to develop your professional and technical skills.


If you are interested, please apply below, and feel free to share this post with any relevant party.


We look forward to receiving your applications!


Successful candidates will be contacted within 2-3 weeks of applying

title: Personalized Internet Assessor (Portuguese Speaker)
description:
Looking for a freelance opportunity where you can make an impact on technology from the comfort of your home? If you are dynamic, tech-savvy, and always online to learn more, this part-time, flexible project is the perfect fit for you!


A Day in the Life of a Personalized Internet Assessor:

  • In this role, you‚Äôll be analyzing and providing feedback on texts, pages, images, and other types of information for top search engines, using an online tool
  • Through reviewing and rating search results for relevance and quality, you‚Äôll be helping to improve the overall user experience for millions of search engine users, including yourself.


Join our team today and start putting your skills to work for one of the world's leading search engines.


The estimated hourly earnings for this role are 5.00 USD per hour. Payment is based on completed tasks, with the potential for higher earnings based on productivity.


TELUS Digital AI Community

Our global AI Community is a vibrant network of 1 million+ contributors from diverse backgrounds who help our customers collect, enhance, train, translate, and localize content to build better AI models. Become part of our growing community and make an impact supporting the machine learning models of some of the world‚Äôs largest brands.


Qualification path


No previous professional experience is required to apply to this role, however, working on this project will require you to pass the basic requirements and go through a standard assessment process. This is a part-time long-term project and your work will be subject to our standard quality assurance checks during the term of this agreement.


Basic Requirements

  • Working as a freelancer with excellent communication skills in Portuguese
  • Being a resident in Brazil for the last 5 consecutive years and having familiarity with current and historical business, media, sport, news, social media, and cultural affairs in Brazil
  • Active use of Gmail, Google+, and other forms of social media and experience in the use of web browsers to navigate and interact with a variety of content
  • Daily access to a broadband internet connection, a smartphone (Android 5.0, iOS 14 or higher), and a personal computer to work on.


Assessment

In order to be hired into the program, you‚Äôll take a language assessment and an open book qualification exam that will determine your suitability for the position and complete ID verification. Don‚Äôt worry, our team will provide you with guidelines and learning materials before your exam. You will be required to complete the exam in a specific timeframe but at your convenience!


Equal Opportunity

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for a contractual relationship without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or protected veteran status. At TELUS Digital AI, we are proud to offer equal opportunities and are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive community. All aspects of selection are based on applicants‚Äô qualifications, merits, competence, and performance without regard to any characteristic related to diversity.

title: Intern Security Researcher (GReAT)
description:
Kaspersky Americas GReAT (Global Research & Analysis Team) is looking for a bright and motivated intern to assist with our cybersecurity research and other activities. Our ideal candidate will be a great technical resource who has enrolled in a Computer Science or Cybersecurity course at an accredited university. You will need to have excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and you will be involved in various research projects and learn firsthand how to proper Malware Analysis, Reverse Engineering, and APT/Crimeware Threat Intelligence. You will have great interaction with stakeholders including local team members throughout the Americas.


It is important to note that this position is an Internship for University Students. Preferred candidates are students enrolled at an accredited University who are studying Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Cybersecurity or similar. Strong English communication skills (both Written and Spoken) are a MUST. While the position will mostly be remote and require a good home office set-up, interns must also be able to work on-site at the local office in Villa Lobos, Sao Paulo when needed and have adequate transportation to the office.


What You Will Be Doing:

  • Support on research projects, developing processes, defining priorities, following deadlines, delivering material and sharing to the right teams.
  • Defining malicious functionality in Windows x86/x64, MSIL, mobile threats, and web related malware
  • Keeping current with latest malware threats affecting our customers
  • Communicate with B2B/B2C clients over our e-mail about adding detections
  • Participating in the development of the unit's recommended practices and standards, assumes responsibility for accomplishing group goals
  • Suggesting ideas to be implemented in company‚Äôs products, prototyping development; imagine and develop prototypes or new detection technologies
  • Content creation; analyzing and describing malicious programs (malware), on threat intel reports and documentation on various topics
  • Presenting about IT security to wide audiences (customers, internal sales, etc...)
  • Monitoring, analysis and understanding of malware trends at local, regional and global level (country, region, world)
  • Travel to conferences to give presentations is optional, but always encouraged.


What You Should Have/Know:

  • Strong desire to learn on your own and share your research with teammates.
  • Interest in malware analysis and security research
  • Knowledge of x86/x64 Intel Assembly (at least 1 year)
  • Basic knowledge of WinAPI
  • Using IDA Disassembler, HIEW, OllyDbg, or Windbg to analyze PE files (at least 1 year)
  • Executable file analysis skills in a hexadecimal editor (Hiew, 010, etc...)
  • Deep knowledge in several of the following fields:
  • mobile device security and mobile malware
  • statistical analysis
  • methods of protection against threats
  • security best practices
  • polymorphic malware
  • rootkits/bootkits
  • Knowledge and skills needed to analyze and understand non-standard threats (MacOS X, ICS, SCADA, ARM, QNX, UEFI/BIOS, etc...)
  • Good knowledge of file formats (archive, image, sound, video, etc...)
  • Ability to analyze and understand malicious code (Windows PE, .Net, OLE2, JS, VBS, HTML, PDF, SWF, ELF)
  • Good knowledge of Linux OS distributions, Linux API / kernel / POSIX standards
  • Excellent knowledge of Windows PE file format
  • Some experience in programming languages (Python, C#, C, C++) (At least 1 year in any)
  • Fluency in English is Mandatory


It would be GReAT if you also have/know :

  • Some hobby experience is strongly desired, as we would love to see any blog posts or research you may have done on your own.
  • Good communication skills; work with developers, analysts, researchers, marketing, PR, sales (etc). using ‚Äúsame language‚Äù
  • Good presentation skills
  • Technical article writing skills
  • Experience in developing tools and documentation for other researchers
  • Understanding the ‚Äúbig picture‚Äù of the IT Security industry + business
  • High ethical standards

title: Business Intelligence Engineer (BI/data analytics/REMOTE)
description:
ITTConnect is seeking a BI Analyst to work remotely for a client in the US. This is a potentially long term position with a client that is a global leader in consulting, digital transformation, technology and engineering services with over 300,000 team members in nearly 50 countries. The end client is in the retail space.


Job location: Remote, work from home, anywhere in Brazil .


Only resumes in English will be reviewed.


MUST BE fluent in English. All interviews will be in English only.


Responsibilities :

  • Design, develop, and maintain robust data models to support analytical and product data needs across the organization
  • Build visually appealing, high-performing, and impactful reporting/dashboard products using tools like Tableau/Sigma across large data sets
  • Collaborate with data engineers, data scientists, and business stakeholders to understand data requirements and translate them into scalable data solutions
  • Implement and optimize ETL/ELT processes to ensure data quality, reliability, and performance
  • Own and define business KPIs, their measurement plans, data requirements and reporting
  • Build processes to ensure correct, timely and reliable reporting
  • Address ad-hoc reporting requirements and find pathways for automation
  • Build and enforce common design patterns to increase report reusability, readability and standardization
  • Collaborates with other teams.


Requirements:

  • 7+ years of IT experience
  • 3+ years experience working in business intelligence, data analytics, Data engineering or a similar role
  • Strong SQL skills and experience with data modeling techniques (e.g., dimensional modeling, 3 Nf, data vault)
  • Proficiency in a programming language such as Python or Scala
  • Experience building reporting and dashboarding solutions using Tableau, Sigma, Data Lake/Snowflake or similar ecosystem
  • Expert in Database fundamentals, SQL and performance tuning
  • Excellent communication skills and experience working with technical and non-technical teams
  • Ability to think strategically, analyze and interpret market and consumer information.


Nice to Haves :


  • Experience with real-time data processing and streaming technologies
  • Experience with modern data warehousing platforms (e.g., Snowflake, DataBricks, Redshift) and knowledge of data visualization tools (e.g., Looker, Tableau)
  • Familiarity with machine learning concepts and their data requirements.

title: MDM Architect
description:
Job Description:


We are seeking a highly experienced and strategic MDM Architect to lead the design, implementation, and governance of our enterprise Master Data Management solutions. This individual will play a pivotal role in shaping and optimizing our data management landscape, with a focus on Informatica MDM, particularly around customer and product domains.

The ideal candidate is a technical leader who has hands-on experience managing and architecting MDM platforms and understands the nuances of data quality, governance, and integration across complex enterprise systems.


Key Responsibilities:

¬∑ Lead the architecture, design, and implementation of Informatica MDM solutions, focusing on customer and product master data domains.

¬∑ Define and drive MDM strategy, standards, and best practices across the organization.

¬∑ Collaborate with business and IT stakeholders to identify MDM needs and translate them into scalable, enterprise-grade solutions.

¬∑ Provide technical leadership and guidance for MDM configurations, customizations, match/merge rules, data stewardship workflows, and integration patterns.

¬∑ Oversee MDM tool management including performance tuning, version upgrades, and patching.

¬∑ Design and maintain MDM data models and metadata standards.

¬∑ Ensure data governance, quality, lineage, and security policies are implemented effectively.

¬∑ Mentor and support MDM developers, analysts, and data stewards.

¬∑ Stay abreast of industry trends and tools to continually enhance the MDM platform.


Qualifications:

¬∑ 10+ years of experience in Data Management or related fields, with at least 5 years in Informatica MDM.

¬∑ Proven experience with Customer and/or Product MDM implementations.

¬∑ Deep understanding of MDM architecture, match/merge logic, hierarchy management, data stewardship, and governance frameworks.

¬∑ Hands-on experience managing the Informatica MDM Hub and associated components.

¬∑ Strong knowledge of data integration techniques and experience with ETL tools.

¬∑ Solid understanding of data modeling, relational databases, and metadata management.

¬∑ Experience with cloud environments (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) and hybrid MDM deployments is a plus.

¬∑ Excellent communication skills and ability to lead cross-functional teams.


Preferred Certifications:

¬∑ Informatica MDM Certification

¬∑ TOGAF, DAMA, or other data architecture/governance-related certifications

title: Assistant Store Manager
description:
Golden Goose is looking for a passionate and customer-focused Assistant Store Manager! The Assistant Store Manager will support the Store Manager by organizing, planning, and implementing strategy. They will ensure team objectives are met, promote and sell products through understanding customer needs, provide expert advice on the Golden Goose collection, maintain store standards, and effectively convey company projects to create an environment of retail excellence.


Responsibilities:

  • Provide supervisory and operational support to the General Manager, including organizing, planning, and implementing strategy
  • Ensure the schedule and store objectives are met by the team
  • Promote and sell products by identifying our customer's needs
  • Advise customers on the entire Golden Goose collection
  • Deliver outstanding customer service and build long-term relationships with customers
  • Maintain the store standards according to the guidelines
  • Guarantee proper Customer Relationship Management according to Company standard
  • Embody and transmit with passion the company projects through effective product knowledge


Qualifications:

  • Minimum 4 years of relevant experience in luxury retail
  • 1-2 years of relevant store management experience
  • Leadership and excellent communication skills
  • Pro-active problem solver with a positive attitude and professional selling techniques
  • Good customer focus with strong presentation, interpersonal, and communication skills
  • Strong team player
  • Other languages a plus
  • Ability to work varied hours and days, including nights, weekends, and holidays as needed


Location: P√°tio Batel - Curitiba


*This job description may not be inclusive of all assigned duties, responsibilities, or aspects of the job described and may be amended at a time at the sole discretion of the Employer


Fostering uniqueness, in Golden Goose, human capital is a true asset, and Diversity & Inclusion have always been essential to our culture.


Golden Goose is an inclusive employer enabling each one to better express their authentic self, regardless of gender, sexual orientation, ethnicity, disability or age.

  • Certifica√ß√µes dos treinamentos feitos dentro da comunidade que garantem que voc√™ obter√° mais resultados juntos aos seus alunos e que agregam na sua carreira como professor independente.


Como saber se voc√™ √© a pessoa certa para fazer parte da maior comunidade de professores independentes do Brasil?

Necess√°rio:

  • Possibilidade de participar em capacita√ß√µes durante a semana, no turno da manh√£ ou tarde.

title: Intern Security Researcher (GReAT)
description:
Kaspersky Americas GReAT (Global Research & Analysis Team) is looking for a bright and motivated intern to assist with our cybersecurity research and other activities. Our ideal candidate will be a great technical resource who has enrolled in a Computer Science or Cybersecurity course at an accredited university. You will need to have excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and you will be involved in various research projects and learn firsthand how to proper Malware Analysis, Reverse Engineering, and APT/Crimeware Threat Intelligence. You will have great interaction with stakeholders including local team members throughout the Americas.


It is important to note that this position is an Internship for University Students. Preferred candidates are students enrolled at an accredited University who are studying Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Cybersecurity or similar. Strong English communication skills (both Written and Spoken) are a MUST. While the position will mostly be remote and require a good home office set-up, interns must also be able to work on-site at the local office in Villa Lobos, Sao Paulo when needed and have adequate transportation to the office.


What You Will Be Doing:

  • Support on research projects, developing processes, defining priorities, following deadlines, delivering material and sharing to the right teams.
  • Defining malicious functionality in Windows x86/x64, MSIL, mobile threats, and web related malware
  • Keeping current with latest malware threats affecting our customers
  • Communicate with B2B/B2C clients over our e-mail about adding detections
  • Participating in the development of the unit's recommended practices and standards, assumes responsibility for accomplishing group goals
  • Suggesting ideas to be implemented in company‚Äôs products, prototyping development; imagine and develop prototypes or new detection technologies
  • Content creation; analyzing and describing malicious programs (malware), on threat intel reports and documentation on various topics
  • Presenting about IT security to wide audiences (customers, internal sales, etc...)
  • Monitoring, analysis and understanding of malware trends at local, regional and global level (country, region, world)
  • Travel to conferences to give presentations is optional, but always encouraged.


What You Should Have/Know:

  • Strong desire to learn on your own and share your research with teammates.
  • Interest in malware analysis and security research
  • Knowledge of x86/x64 Intel Assembly (at least 1 year)
  • Basic knowledge of WinAPI
  • Using IDA Disassembler, HIEW, OllyDbg, or Windbg to analyze PE files (at least 1 year)
  • Executable file analysis skills in a hexadecimal editor (Hiew, 010, etc...)
  • Deep knowledge in several of the following fields:
  • mobile device security and mobile malware
  • statistical analysis
  • methods of protection against threats
  • security best practices
  • polymorphic malware
  • rootkits/bootkits
  • Knowledge and skills needed to analyze and understand non-standard threats (MacOS X, ICS, SCADA, ARM, QNX, UEFI/BIOS, etc...)
  • Good knowledge of file formats (archive, image, sound, video, etc...)
  • Ability to analyze and understand malicious code (Windows PE, .Net, OLE2, JS, VBS, HTML, PDF, SWF, ELF)
  • Good knowledge of Linux OS distributions, Linux API / kernel / POSIX standards
  • Excellent knowledge of Windows PE file format
  • Some experience in programming languages (Python, C#, C, C++) (At least 1 year in any)
  • Fluency in English is Mandatory


It would be GReAT if you also have/know :

  • Some hobby experience is strongly desired, as we would love to see any blog posts or research you may have done on your own.
  • Good communication skills; work with developers, analysts, researchers, marketing, PR, sales (etc). using ‚Äúsame language‚Äù
  • Good presentation skills
  • Technical article writing skills
  • Experience in developing tools and documentation for other researchers
  • Understanding the ‚Äúbig picture‚Äù of the IT Security industry + business
  • High ethical standards

  • Suggesting ideas to be implemented in company‚Äôs products, prototyping development; imagine and develop prototypes or new detection technologies
  • Content creation; analyzing and describing malicious programs (malware), on threat intel reports and documentation on various topics
  • Presenting about IT security to wide audiences (customers, internal sales, etc...)
  • Monitoring, analysis and understanding of malware trends at local, regional and global level (country, region, world)
  • Travel to conferences to give presentations is optional, but always encouraged.


What You Should Have/Know:

  • Strong desire to learn on your own and share your research with teammates.
  • Interest in malware analysis and security research
  • Knowledge of x86/x64 Intel Assembly (at least 1 year)
  • Basic knowledge of WinAPI
  • Using IDA Disassembler, HIEW, OllyDbg, or Windbg to analyze PE files (at least 1 year)
  • Executable file analysis skills in a hexadecimal editor (Hiew, 010, etc...)
  • Deep knowledge in several of the following fields:
  • mobile device security and mobile malware
  • statistical analysis
  • methods of protection against threats
  • security best practices
  • polymorphic malware
  • rootkits/bootkits
  • Knowledge and skills needed to analyze and understand non-standard threats (MacOS X, ICS, SCADA, ARM, QNX, UEFI/BIOS, etc...)
  • Good knowledge of file formats (archive, image, sound, video, etc...)
  • Ability to analyze and understand malicious code (Windows PE, .Net, OLE2, JS, VBS, HTML, PDF, SWF, ELF)
  • Good knowledge of Linux OS distributions, Linux API / kernel / POSIX standards
  • Excellent knowledge of Windows PE file format
  • Some experience in programming languages (Python, C#, C, C++) (At least 1 year in any)
  • Fluency in English is Mandatory


It would be GReAT if you also have/know :

  • Some hobby experience is strongly desired, as we would love to see any blog posts or research you may have done on your own.
  • Good communication skills; work with developers, analysts, researchers, marketing, PR, sales (etc). using ‚Äúsame language‚Äù
  • Good presentation skills
  • Technical article writing skills
  • Experience in developing tools and documentation for other researchers
  • Understanding the ‚Äúbig picture‚Äù of the IT Security industry + business
  • High ethical standards

title: Junior Financial Researcher (Research Associate)
description:
About YipitData:

YipitData is the market-leading data and analytics firm. We analyze billions of data points every day to provide accurate, detailed insights across industries, including consumer brands, technology, software, and healthcare.

Our insights team uses proprietary technology to identify, license, clean, and analyze the data that many of the world‚Äôs largest investment funds and corporations depend on. We raised $475M from The Carlyle Group at a valuation over $1B, further accelerating our growth and market impact.

We have been recognized multiple times as one of Inc‚Äôs Best Workplaces. As a fast-growing company backed by The Carlyle Group and Norwest Venture Partners, YipitData is driven by a people-first culture rooted in mastery, ownership, and transparency.

With offices in New York, Austin, Miami, Denver, Mountain View, Seattle, Hong Kong, Shanghai, Beijing, Guangzhou, and Singapore, we continue to expand our reach and impact across global markets.


About The Role:

We currently have 20+ Research team members in our Investor Research business who create and maintain our data products, and we are expanding our team by adding a Junior Research Associate role to drive the development of fundamental research for our high-demand subscription-based data products . This is an exciting opportunity for someone with 1-2 years of experience who is eager to play a key role in shaping the data-driven future of investment research by supporting senior research team members in key tasks including: answering client emails, analyzing data trends across multiple tickers, and delivering custom slices of data via SQL/Python. Those with excellent data analytical and written communication skills are encouraged to apply.


We expect East Coast work hours.

As Our Junior Research Associate You Will:

  • Support high-impact work by helping the Research Analyst analyze financial models, identify segment-level trends, and convey client-facing takeaways.
  • You will work with massive amounts of data to help answer our clients‚Äô key questions about the companies we cover and the datasets we analyze. You will learn about our proprietary methods and techniques for ensuring data accuracy and deriving key insights.
  • Become a trusted resource for our internal stakeholders and sector teams, working with them to identify and answer their key questions. By contributing to data deliverables, custom analysis, or data reports consumed by the top investors in the world.
  • Improve our products and increase our coverage by supporting the Research Analyst in maintaining product integrity and completing deliverables to clients, including developing new features and product improvements. We value self-improvement and experimentation and expect you to enhance the products, pipelines, or processes that you own.
  • Sharpen SQL and Python skills , our new hire training program will enrich and expand SQL fundamentals.


You Are Likely To Succeed If:

  • You have 1-2 years of experience in financial banking or investment research and have a strong understanding of business fundamentals
  • You have experience as a research or data analyst, ideally with some exposure to SQL
  • You have strong attention to detail and are a methodical problem-solver
  • You have excellent oral and written communication skills, with the ability to interact effectively with internal teams across time zones and cultures
  • You strive to make tasks as efficient as possible
  • You are enthusiastic about making a big impact at a rapidly growing company


What We Offer:

  • Our compensation package includes competitive salary and comprehensive benefit offerings.
  • We care about your career. We provide opportunities to grow your career by taking on new challenges, developing new skill sets, and driving more impact. You will have regular career conversations with your manager where you will discuss your short and long-term career goals and how you are progressing.
  • Your growth at YipitData is determined by the impact that you make, not by tenure, unnecessary Facetime, or office politics. Everyone at YipitData is empowered to learn, self-improve, and master their skills in an environment focused on ownership, respect, and trust.
  • Flexible PTO for any reason, including sick days (no specified limits)
  • Flexible work schedule
  • Personal laptop
  • Health and wellness package
  • Remote work


At YipitData, we value ownership and impact. Starting compensation is based on level and years of relevant experience. We have a thoughtfully created career ladder and annual review process that are designed to reward strong performance with opportunities for compensation increases and advancement.


See this short video to learn more about our organization, product, and why some of our current Data team members love working here!


Candidates must have primary residency (and be physically located) in the country of hire (Brazil) in order to be considered for the position. If hired, the worker must maintain primary residency in the country of hire in order to be eligible for employment.


We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability, gender, gender identity or expression, or veteran status. We are proud to be an equal-opportunity employer.

title: Junior Financial Researcher (Research Associate)
description:
About YipitData:

YipitData is the market-leading data and analytics firm. We analyze billions of data points every day to provide accurate, detailed insights across industries, including consumer brands, technology, software, and healthcare.

Our insights team uses proprietary technology to identify, license, clean, and analyze the data that many of the world‚Äôs largest investment funds and corporations depend on. We raised $475M from The Carlyle Group at a valuation over $1B, further accelerating our growth and market impact.

We have been recognized multiple times as one of Inc‚Äôs Best Workplaces. As a fast-growing company backed by The Carlyle Group and Norwest Venture Partners, YipitData is driven by a people-first culture rooted in mastery, ownership, and transparency.

With offices in New York, Austin, Miami, Denver, Mountain View, Seattle, Hong Kong, Shanghai, Beijing, Guangzhou, and Singapore, we continue to expand our reach and impact across global markets.


About The Role:

We currently have 20+ Research team members in our Investor Research business who create and maintain our data products, and we are expanding our team by adding a Junior Research Associate role to drive the development of fundamental research for our high-demand subscription-based data products . This is an exciting opportunity for someone with 1-2 years of experience who is eager to play a key role in shaping the data-driven future of investment research by supporting senior research team members in key tasks including: answering client emails, analyzing data trends across multiple tickers, and delivering custom slices of data via SQL/Python. Those with excellent data analytical and written communication skills are encouraged to apply.


We expect East Coast work hours.

As Our Junior Research Associate You Will:

  • Support high-impact work by helping the Research Analyst analyze financial models, identify segment-level trends, and convey client-facing takeaways.
  • You will work with massive amounts of data to help answer our clients‚Äô key questions about the companies we cover and the datasets we analyze. You will learn about our proprietary methods and techniques for ensuring data accuracy and deriving key insights.
  • Become a trusted resource for our internal stakeholders and sector teams, working with them to identify and answer their key questions. By contributing to data deliverables, custom analysis, or data reports consumed by the top investors in the world.
  • Improve our products and increase our coverage by supporting the Research Analyst in maintaining product integrity and completing deliverables to clients, including developing new features and product improvements. We value self-improvement and experimentation and expect you to enhance the products, pipelines, or processes that you own.
  • Sharpen SQL and Python skills , our new hire training program will enrich and expand SQL fundamentals.


You Are Likely To Succeed If:

  • You have 1-2 years of experience in financial banking or investment research and have a strong understanding of business fundamentals
  • You have experience as a research or data analyst, ideally with some exposure to SQL
  • You have strong attention to detail and are a methodical problem-solver
  • You have excellent oral and written communication skills, with the ability to interact effectively with internal teams across time zones and cultures
  • You strive to make tasks as efficient as possible
  • You are enthusiastic about making a big impact at a rapidly growing company


What We Offer:

  • Our compensation package includes competitive salary and comprehensive benefit offerings.
  • We care about your career. We provide opportunities to grow your career by taking on new challenges, developing new skill sets, and driving more impact. You will have regular career conversations with your manager where you will discuss your short and long-term career goals and how you are progressing.
  • Your growth at YipitData is determined by the impact that you make, not by tenure, unnecessary Facetime, or office politics. Everyone at YipitData is empowered to learn, self-improve, and master their skills in an environment focused on ownership, respect, and trust.
  • Flexible PTO for any reason, including sick days (no specified limits)
  • Flexible work schedule
  • Personal laptop
  • Health and wellness package
  • Remote work


At YipitData, we value ownership and impact. Starting compensation is based on level and years of relevant experience. We have a thoughtfully created career ladder and annual review process that are designed to reward strong performance with opportunities for compensation increases and advancement.


See this short video to learn more about our organization, product, and why some of our current Data team members love working here!

title: Supply Chain Analyst - Remote
description:
Recognized as the leading software development company in the Americas, our client offers 100% remote modality and an excellent work environment where employees can thrive, and work in multicultural teams, with flexible schedules and endless growth opportunities.


About the Role:


We are looking for a Supply Chain Analyst to join our team and help drive our growth. As a Supply Chain Analyst, you will play a critical and active role in the day-to-day operations. This is an excellent opportunity to be one of the key members of our team and position yourself for unique career growth opportunities.

What You‚Äôll Do:


- Determine supply needs for products and services and research potential suppliers.

- Act as a link and communicate pricing and performance needs to vendors and suppliers.

- Participate in negotiations of favorable procurement contracts and prices with selected vendors and suppliers.

- Select the most suitable suppliers in terms of reliability, product quality, and cost-efficiency.

- Maintain and update a list of suppliers and their qualifications, delivery times, and potential future development.

- Prepare cost-benefit analysis reports for review by managers.




Here‚Äôs what we are looking for:


- 2+ years experience in a supply management role or related position.

- Knowledge of SAP or SAP B1.

- Degree in supply chain management, logistics, business management, or related fields.

- Experience in managing inventory.

- SQL analysis tools and mathematical analysis.

- Interpersonal skills and ability to build and improve trust.

- Advanced English level.


Benefits:


- 100% remote work.

- Flexible hours - make your own schedule!

- Diverse and multicultural work environment.

- Paid parental leave, vacation & holidays.

- Hardware setup for you to work from home.

- Excellent compensation ‚Äî well above the market average.

- Extensive opportunities for growth and professional development thanks to our mentoring system.


Enjoy the opportunity to have a dynamic lifestyle, better health, and wellness. Find renewed passion in your job, improve your productivity, and benefit from attractive growth opportunities for your career.


If you are interested in being part of a team composed of the best professionals and working 100% goal-oriented in an innovative environment, but with the structure and resources of a multinational market leader, do not hesitate to apply!

title: Backend Developer
description:
Are you passionate about building scalable, high-performance backend systems? We're looking for a skilled Backend Engineer with strong Java/Kotlin and JVM-based development expertise to join our team.


Job Description:

Proficiency in Java, Kotlin, and JVM-based development is essential, along with strong object-oriented programming (OOP) skills and exception handling. Experience with the Spring Boot framework, web technologies, and Quarkus is required. Understanding of 12-factor app principles is crucial. Proficiency in using Git, GitHub, and GitHub Actions for version control and CI/CD is necessary. Knowledge of PostgreSQL databases and experience with Apache Kafka are important. Developing and maintaining REST APIs is a key responsibility. If needed, proficiency in Salesforce Development (SFDC) and Salesforce Marketing Cloud (SFMC) is also required. This role involves leveraging these skills to build, optimize, and maintain robust and scalable backend systems.


Skills:

‚Äì Proficiency in front-end technologies (e.g., HTML, CSS, JavaScript)

‚Äì Proficiency in Java, Kotlin, JVM, OOP, Exception handling

‚Äì Apache Kafka / Spring Boot framework, Quarkus, and Web technologies

‚Äì If needed, proficiency in Shopify/SFCC/Stibo/SFSC/SFDC/SFMC

‚Äì Software Development experience and knowledge of the Software Delivery Lifecycle, Security Compliance, and Agile and SCRUM methodology, industry and competitor practices

‚Äì Experience with DevOps technologies including GitHub, GitHub Actions, Chef, Jenkins, Puppet, or ArgoCD

‚Äì Comprehensive knowledge of various software languages and platforms such as Java Spring Boot, MongoDB / PostgreSQL, and public cloud (Azure / OCI)

‚Äì Experience with Docker and Kubernetes (AKS/GKE)

‚Äì Experience with alerting mechanisms using Nagios, New Relic, GCP, or Splunk

‚Äì Experience in API management and Microservices development

‚Äì Experience with RabbitMQ

‚Äì Knowledge of 12-factor App principles


Apply now or connect with us to learn more!

title: Junior Devops Engineer
description:
About the company:

Avenue Code is the leading software consultancy focused on delivering end-to-end development solutions for digital transformation across every vertical. We‚Äôre privately held, profitable, and have been on a solid growth trajectory since day one. We care deeply about our clients, our partners, and our people. We prefer the word ‚Äòpartner‚Äô over ‚Äòvendor‚Äô, and our investment in professional relationships is a reflection of that philosophy. We pride ourselves on our technical acumen, our collaborative problem-solving ability, and the warm professionalism of our teams.

Avenue Code has been believing in and promoting plurality actions for over 10 years, understanding that recognizing differences and fostering a safe environment, employment opportunities, representation, and support are the best ways to promote an increasingly equitable culture.


About the opportunity:

We are seeking a motivated Junior DevOps Engineer to support our cloud infrastructure and deployment pipelines in a dynamic environment leveraging Kubernetes, AWS, GCP, and Terraform.

In this role, you will assist in automating infrastructure provisioning, managing containerized applications, and maintaining CI/CD workflows to ensure smooth and scalable deployments.


Responsibilities:

  • Develop and maintain the core back-end systems and APIs that power our platform, ensuring high availability and scalability.
  • Design and implement the back-end infrastructure for critical services like email, notifications, and IAM, focusing on performance and security.
  • Ensure the scalability, security, and reliability of platform services using best practices in architecture, design, and testing.
  • Develop structured and backward-compatible APIs with appropriate versioning.


Required Qualifications:

  • Minimum 2 years of experience in DevOps, System Administration, or a related IT role
  • Hands-on exposure to cloud platforms (especially AWS) through internships, academic projects, or personal labs.
  • Familiarity with containerization technologies such as Docker and orchestration tools like Kubernet .Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git/GitHub)
  • Exposure to logging, metrics collection, and observability tools (e.g., DataDog, Prometheus, Grafana, ELK stack, CloudWatch)
  • Basic understanding of networking concepts and common protocols (e.g., TCP/IP, HTTP, DNS, SSH, TLS)


Note: Fluent in English; Bachelor's degree required.


Avenue Code reinforces its commitment to privacy and to all the principles guaranteed by the most accurate global data protection laws, such as GDPR, LGPD, CCPA and CPRA. The Candidate data shared with Avenue Code will be kept confidential and will not be transmitted to disinterested third parties, nor will it be used for purposes other than the application for open positions. As a Consultancy company, Avenue Code may share your information with its clients and other Companies from the CompassUol Group to which Avenue Code‚Äôs consultants are allocated to perform its services.

title: ServiceNow Manager
description:
Our client is seeking a Senior ServiceNow Project Manager to serve as a strategic bridge between their U.S.-based management and development teams and the nearshore technical team.


This role requires a seasoned ServiceNow expert with 10+ years of experience , capable of overseeing end-to-end platform implementations, managing cross-functional teams, and translating complex business requirements into technical solutions.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Act as liaison between U.S. stakeholders and nearshore ServiceNow development team.
  • Drive full lifecycle implementations of the ServiceNow platform.
  • Manage project timelines, documentation, and cross-team collaboration.
  • Analyze business needs and translate them into ServiceNow configuration and process improvements.
  • Lead requirement-gathering sessions and oversee project deliverables.


Required Qualifications:

  • 10+ years of hands-on experience with the ServiceNow platform .
  • Proven track record in end-to-end implementations .
  • Strong experience in project management and team leadership.
  • Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills in English (C1+ level) .


Bonus:

  • Experience with HR Service Delivery (HRSD) or other HR modules within ServiceNow.


This is a remote opportunity , offering an exciting chance to work in a global environment and lead strategic ServiceNow initiatives.

Avenue Code is the leading software consultancy focused on delivering end-to-end development solutions for digital transformation across every vertical. We‚Äôre privately held, profitable, and have been on a solid growth trajectory since day one. We care deeply about our clients, our partners, and our people. We prefer the word ‚Äòpartner‚Äô over ‚Äòvendor‚Äô, and our investment in professional relationships is a reflection of that philosophy. We pride ourselves on our technical acumen, our collaborative problem-solving ability, and the warm professionalism of our teams.

Avenue Code has been believing in and promoting plurality actions for over 10 years, understanding that recognizing differences and fostering a safe environment, employment opportunities, representation, and support are the best ways to promote an increasingly equitable culture.


About the opportunity:

We are seeking a motivated Junior DevOps Engineer to support our cloud infrastructure and deployment pipelines in a dynamic environment leveraging Kubernetes, AWS, GCP, and Terraform.

In this role, you will assist in automating infrastructure provisioning, managing containerized applications, and maintaining CI/CD workflows to ensure smooth and scalable deployments.


Responsibilities:

  • Develop and maintain the core back-end systems and APIs that power our platform, ensuring high availability and scalability.
  • Design and implement the back-end infrastructure for critical services like email, notifications, and IAM, focusing on performance and security.
  • Ensure the scalability, security, and reliability of platform services using best practices in architecture, design, and testing.
  • Develop structured and backward-compatible APIs with appropriate versioning.


Required Qualifications:

  • Minimum 2 years of experience in DevOps, System Administration, or a related IT role
  • Hands-on exposure to cloud platforms (especially AWS) through internships, academic projects, or personal labs.
  • Familiarity with containerization technologies such as Docker and orchestration tools like Kubernet .Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git/GitHub)
  • Exposure to logging, metrics collection, and observability tools (e.g., DataDog, Prometheus, Grafana, ELK stack, CloudWatch)
  • Basic understanding of networking concepts and common protocols (e.g., TCP/IP, HTTP, DNS, SSH, TLS)


Note: Fluent in English; Bachelor's degree required.


Avenue Code reinforces its commitment to privacy and to all the principles guaranteed by the most accurate global data protection laws, such as GDPR, LGPD, CCPA and CPRA. The Candidate data shared with Avenue Code will be kept confidential and will not be transmitted to disinterested third parties, nor will it be used for purposes other than the application for open positions. As a Consultancy company, Avenue Code may share your information with its clients and other Companies from the CompassUol Group to which Avenue Code‚Äôs consultants are allocated to perform its services.

title: Senior Ruby on Rails Developer
description:
Open to engineers from any country!


We are TCSA, a performance marketing ad agency focused on delivering the world's most effective ads. Our team is dedicated to creating engaging user experiences and solutions that meet the unique needs of our clients. As a Ruby on Rails Developer, you will have the opportunity to work on exciting projects that involve deploying and maintaining applications that utilize cutting-edge technologies in a collaborative environment.


Role Responsibilities

In this position, you will:

  • Develop and maintain web applications using Ruby on Rails, ensuring high performance and responsiveness.
  • Collaborate with the design and product teams to implement user-friendly interfaces with Vue.js.
  • Manage and optimize PostgreSQL databases to ensure data integrity and performance.
  • Utilize AWS services, particularly ECS, for application deployment and scaling.
  • Operate independently, taking initiative to solve complex problems and improve application functionality.
  • Participate in code reviews and contribute to the continuous improvement of development processes.


What We Are Looking For

We are seeking a candidate who possesses a solid foundation in the following technologies:

  • Expertise in Ruby on Rails for backend development.
  • Experience with Vue.js for frontend development.
  • Familiarity with PostgreSQL and the ability to write efficient queries.
  • Basic knowledge of AWS services, especially ECS.


In addition to technical skills, desired personal traits include:

  • Strong problem-solving ability and attention to detail.
  • Self-motivated with a proactive mindset.
  • Excellent communication and teamwork skills.


Nice to Have Skills

  • Experience in adtech, particularly in developing plugins or tools.
  • Experience in Rust
  • Proficiency in design tools like Figma, Canva, and/or Photoshop.


We encourage you to apply as these experiences can give you a competitive edge in our innovative environment.


Why Join Us?

At TCSA, we value our employees and offer a range of benefits, including:

  • Competitive salary.
  • Flexible working hours and a supportive remote work environment.
  • Opportunities for professional development and continuous learning.
  • A collaborative culture focused on innovation and creativity.
  • A workplace that encourages your personal initiatives and ideas.


Join us as we continue to push the boundaries of technology and create impactful solutions in the adtech space!

Job Title: Unity Developer


About:

Flatiron is a global remote software development company with engineers located around the world. We unite experts from diverse backgrounds and experiences in a collaborative culture to deliver exceptional products and services for our clients. As a forward-thinking software engineering company, we provide industry-leading solutions to complex problems in both the US and the UK. Operating in a fast-paced, agile environment, we specialize in software consulting for our clients. We offer a stimulating and rewarding environment for our team members. We value innovation, continuous learning, and professional growth, and we strive to create a workplace where everyone can thrive. Join us at Flatiron and be a part of a team that is shaping the future of software development.


Job Summary:

We are seeking a skilled Unity Developer to contribute to the development of simulation environments for advanced robotics and drone systems. The ideal candidate will work on creating immersive, ROS-based simulators for hardware embodiments such as drones and robotic dogs, ensuring seamless integration with sensor data streams and control outputs.This role requires close coordination with Python-based foundation models, as the core model interface must reside in Python.


This is a full-time fully remote working opportunity where you will be working as part of a Scrum team which requires working closely with other software engineers, stakeholders and contributors on the project. Working with respect to the US timezone is a requirement for the position. Attending meetings, being actively involved in the decision making process and collaborating with all of these stakeholders are essential parts of this position.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop and maintain ROS-based simulation environments for drones and robotic dogs.
  • Integrate Unity with PX4 and Unitree ROS simulators to simulate real-world scenarios.
  • Create realistic sensor data streams (e.g., RGB video, audio, and other inputs) for testing foundation models.
  • Collaborate with AI and embedded systems teams to ensure accurate simulation of hardware control outputs.
  • Optimize simulation performance for real-time processing and extensibility.
  • Ensure simulations are designed to enable seamless integration and testing of Python-based foundation models.
  • Create comprehensive documentation covering API endpoints, data handling procedures, model integration methods, and simulation instructions to ensure clarity and scalability in the final deliverables.


Required Skills:

  • Proficiency in Unity development, including 3D modeling and physics-based simulations.
  • Experience with ROS (Robot Operating System) and integrating Unity with ROS-based simulators.
  • Familiarity with PX4 and Unitree ROS simulation environments.
  • Strong understanding of sensor data processing (e.g., RGB video, audio).
  • Proven experience working with Python-based systems for API integration, data handling, and serving as the primary interface layer for model interactions.
  • Ability to work collaboratively in a cross-functional team environment.


Preferred Qualifications:

  • Experience with drone or robotic simulation frameworks.
  • Familiarity with SLAM (Simultaneous Localization and Mapping) and VIO (Visual-Inertial Odometry).
  • Understanding of hardware control systems and actuator interfaces.


Benefits

  • Yearly Office Allowance Budget
  • Macbook Purchase Support
  • Wellbeing Support


If you are a good fit for the position, please apply through .

We only accept CVs that are in English.


Flatiron has a zero tolerance to discrimination policy. In this regard, during the course of the evaluation of your job application and all your employment relation, if any, all discriminatory factors such as race, sex, sexual orientation, social gender definitions/roles, color, national or social background, ethnicity, religion, age, disablement, political opinion or any status that is protected under law shall be disregarded.

title: Senior Python Developer - Remote
description:
At INDI, we're passionate about empowering individuals and businesses worldwide. Our cutting-edge recruiters connect leading companies with top talent, fostering a dynamic environment where innovation thrives. Join us in shaping the future of work.


About the Role:


Step into the world of advanced software engineering as our Senior Python Developer, where you'll architect sophisticated solutions for global clients. This isn't just about coding - it's about leading technical initiatives, mentoring rising talent, and solving complex challenges using Python's powerful ecosystem while driving innovation in cloud environments, data processing, and web development.


What will I do?

Create automation systems and tools to configure, monitor, and orchestrate data infrastructure and pipelines.

Develop data integration services that accelerate customer onboarding processes.

Ensure reliability, performance, and support of data infrastructure with solutions aligned to application needs and growth projections.

Lead the design and implementation of complex Python applications.

Guide junior developers through comprehensive code reviews and technical mentoring.

Architect scalable solutions using modern design patterns and industry best practices.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to transform business requirements into technical specifications.


Required skills and qualifications:


5+ years of hands-on experience in Python and Django development.

Experience with SQL and NoSQL Databases.

Experience with Microservices and Cloud environments.

Advanced algorithm knowledge.

Intermediate agile methodologies management.

Strong understanding of best practices, SOLID principles, CLEAN Code, and scalable solutions.

Design Patterns knowledge.

Experience developing entire applications from scratch.

Experience in automated tests, CI/CD pipelines.

Strong experience with version control.

Strong experience with Unit testing, integration testing, and code coverage.

Advanced English proficiency.


Benefits:


‚Ä¢ Flexibility: Choose where and how you work for enhanced creativity and innovation.

‚Ä¢ Tailored Compensation: Personalize your earnings to suit your financial goals.

‚Ä¢ Tech-Driven Tools: Access cutting-edge resources for seamless collaboration and productivity.

‚Ä¢ Autonomous Workflow: Take control of your schedule to achieve work-life balance.

‚Ä¢ Well-being: Enjoy generous leave policies for rest and rejuvenation.

‚Ä¢ Diversity & Inclusion: Thrive in a diverse and inclusive environment.

‚Ä¢ Collaboration: Engage with industry leaders for collective growth.

‚Ä¢ Development: Access mentorship and growth opportunities for continuous advancement.


If you are interested in being part of a team composed of the best professionals and working 100% goal-oriented in an innovative environment, but with the structure and resources of a multinational market leader, do not hesitate to apply!

title: Cloud Data Postgresql
description:
Mandatory Skills Description:


  • Must have: strong DBA experience, specifically with Azure and Postgres on Azure
  • Readiness to work until 9.00 pm CET (no need to do overtimes);
  • Strong DBA experience
  • Experience of work with Azure
  • Excellent skills in Postgres tuning with and without tools and plugins / extensions
  • Strong experience managing PostgreSQL in Azure
  • Advanced knowledge of SQL Queries, Joins, functions and procedures
  • Networking, Infra components, Postgres settings and flags
  • Monitoring tools and usage of analyzing workloads and query bench marks measurements for applications
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills



Project Description:


  • The primary goal of the project is the modernization, maintenance and development of an eCommerce platform for a big US-based retail company, serving millions of omnichannel customers each week.
  • Solutions are delivered by several Product Teams focused on different domains - Customer, Loyalty, Search and Browse, Data Integration, Cart.
  • Current overriding priorities are new brands onboarding, re-architecture, database migrations, migration of microservices to a unified cloud-native solution without any disruption to business.


Responsibilities:


  • We are looking for a Database Administrator with experience of managing PostgreSQL in a cloud, who can help to tune performance of client platform:
  • Quickly onboard to Customer's processes
  • Performance tuning on request
  • DBA work with Incident tickets
  • Collaborate with other teams and client to find the best solutions

title: Junior Engineer
description:
XILO, a fast-growing Vertical AI company recently backed by a Series A financing round , is on the lookout for talented and detail-oriented SWEs to join our team.


About XILO

Founded in 2019 by two best friends, Jon and Eli, XILO set out to revolutionize the insurance industry by solving its biggest challenges. Eli, a brokerage owner, brought invaluable industry expertise, while Jon, an experienced software engineer, saw an opportunity to innovate using technology. Initially launched as a vertical SaaS solution addressing core quoting challenges, XILO has since evolved into a trailblazing Vertical AI company leveraging the latest AI technology to transform the industry. By layering cutting-edge AI solutions onto its SaaS platform, XILO is driving innovation far beyond its original vision. Having recently closed our Series A funding round, XILO is growing rapidly and seeking talented individuals who want to do career-defining work in a mission-driven startup that‚Äôs at the forefront of AI innovation.


About The Role

As a SWE at XILO, you‚Äôll be at the forefront of ensuring customer satisfaction and operational excellence. Your role will involve swiftly completing non-development tasks for our customers and internal teams with a sharp focus on quality . Your contributions will directly shape how our customers perceive the value of our product, making you a key player in maintaining XILO‚Äôs reputation for exceptional service.


Key Responsibilities

  • Complete 20 points per week (typically 5-10 cases).
  • Provide daily progress updates to Project Managers.
  • Test your work to achieve a 90%+ completion rate on cases.
  • Unblock your cases by proactively reaching out to customers or teammates.
  • Communicate consistently with the team via Slack.


What We‚Äôre Looking For

  • Proven technical experience and ability to learn complex subjects quickly.
  • Highly process-oriented and detail-focused.
  • Relentless work ethic: doesn‚Äôt stop until the job is done.
  • Strong communicator who ensures transparency and clarity.
  • Positive, motivating, and supportive team player.
  • Accountable for successes and failures with a mindset for growth.
  • Balances individual contributions with team collaboration.
  • Passionate about technology and AI


What we offer

  • Collaborative and innovative work environment.
  • Flex PTO for any reason, including sick days (no specified limits), flexible work schedule.
  • Personal laptop.
  • Health and wellness package.


Why join XILO?

Be part of a customer-obsessed team at the cutting edge of AI and insurance technology. You‚Äôll have the opportunity to impact customers directly , grow your technical and professional skills, and thrive in a positive and supportive work environment . At XILO, we don‚Äôt stop until the job is done . If you‚Äôre ready to roll up your sleeves , embrace challenges, and make a meaningful impact, we‚Äôd love to hear from you.


Apply only if you‚Äôre ready to invest in your success and build a lasting career.

title: Paid Media Manager
description:
Our client helps businesses grow through paid social (Meta & TikTok) media buying, creative strategy and creative production. They focus on driving new customers, improving revenue, and delivering clear, measurable results.They are currently looking to hire a Paid Ads manager to join their currently expanding team.


Qualifications:

- 2+ years of hands-on experience managing paid social campaigns, specifically on Meta (Facebook/Instagram) and TikTok Ads Manager.

- Proven track record of customer acquisition and ROAS-focused campaign strategies.

- Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret performance data and make real-time optimizations.

- Experience working with eCommerce brands or direct-to-consumer (DTC) clients is a plus.

- Solid understanding of creative testing frameworks, audience targeting, and funnel strategy.

- Proficiency in ad platform tools and reporting dashboards (Meta Ads Manager, TikTok Ads, Google Analytics, etc.).

- Excellent communication skills and ability to collaborate cross-functionally with creative and strategy teams.

- Self-motivated, highly organized, and able to manage multiple campaigns and priorities simultaneously.


Responsibilities:

- Plan, launch, and optimize paid social campaigns across Meta and TikTok for a variety of client accounts.

- Collaborate with creative strategists and designers to develop and test ad creatives that convert.

- Monitor campaign performance daily, adjusting budgets, bids, and audiences to improve KPIs like CAC, ROAS, and CTR.

- Build and present performance reports, insights, and actionable recommendations to both internal teams and clients.

- Stay up-to-date with industry trends, platform updates, and emerging best practices in paid social.

- Contribute to broader growth strategies by sharing insights on ad performance, audience behavior, and creative trends.

- Support onboarding and scaling of new client accounts, including account structure setup and initial testing frameworks.

title: Keeta - Business Analyst (Traffic Analysis)
description:
Job Introduction:

Optimize traffic allocation through data analysis to drive transaction growth. Requires 4+ years in traffic analysis, SQL expertise, and project management. Highlights: Impact core business metrics while collaborating with global teams on Meituan's international expansion.


Job Responsibilities:

1. Develop traffic analysis frameworks based on business objectives to guide traffic allocation optimization.

2. Establish user-side traffic evaluation mechanisms, optimize traffic resources, and drive iterative traffic strategies.

3. Analyze in-app user behavior to understand how traffic allocation drives transaction growth and provide actionable recommendations.

4. Evaluate various traffic allocation methods to identify high-efficiency investment opportunities.

5. Participate in goal-setting, experiment design, monitoring, and evaluation of key traffic distribution projects.


Job Requirements:

1. 4+ years in internet traffic analysis with deep business logic understanding (traffic operations experience preferred).

2. Strong logical thinking with both strategic vision and attention to detail.

3. SQL proficiency for data extraction, analysis, and insight-driven reporting.

4. Project management skills and effective stakeholder communication.

5. Goal-oriented, self-motivated, and skilled in summarization.


Job Highlights:

1. Join Meituan's global expansion team working with international talents.

2. Own core traffic evaluation with direct business impact.
