title: DevOps Engineer
description:
Responsible for automating infrastructure provisioning, configuration, and management of CI/CD pipelines in Azure DevOps for GCP environments. Collaborates with the development team to ensure efficient and secure application deployment.


Responsibilities:


  • Collaborate with the teams in the provisioning and configuration of GCP infrastructure (Cloud Run, Pub/Sub, SQL, Redis, Storage, etc.) using IaC (Terraform mentioned).
  • Implement and manage CI/CD pipelines in Azure DevOps (Azure Repos, Azure Pipelines) for all application components (except Dialogflow CX).
  • Configure repositories in Azure Repos following the defined Gitflow.
  • Integrate security tools (e.g., Veracode) into the pipelines.
  • Set up monitoring and logging, assisting with exporting to ELK stack.
  • Manage Service Accounts and Secrets.
  • Automate build, test, and deployment processes.
  • Collaborate with the development team to optimize software delivery processes.
  • Ensure compliance with security and infrastructure policies.


Special Skills:


  • Proven experience as a DevOps Engineer.
  • Deep knowledge of Azure DevOps (Pipelines, Repos, Artifacts, Test Plans).
  • Solid experience in cloud infrastructure provisioning (preferably GCP) using IaC (Terraform).
  • Experience with containerization (Docker) and serverless/orchestration platforms (Cloud Run).
  • Experience with CI/CD tools and build automation (Maven/Gradle, npm/yarn).
  • Proficiency in scripting (Bash, Python, etc.).
  • Experience with Git and branching strategies (Gitflow).
  • Knowledge of monitoring and logging tools (Cloud Logging, ELK Stack).
  • Familiarity with cloud and pipeline security concepts (SAST/DAST ‚Äì Veracode).

title: Frontend Engineer (Typescript / GraphQL / FE frameworks)
description:
Job Title : Frontend Engineer (Typescript / GraphQL / FE frameworks)

Location : Remote (Brazil)

Full-time job


Client: Turing



Job Responsibility:

Work cross-functionally with product, design, and other engineering counterparts to execute on product and business strategy and build novel products and features that our users will love.

Contribute to the full development cycle: technical design, development, test, experimentation, analysis, and launch. You‚Äôll be reviewing code and design docs, giving feedback on product specs and mocks.

Participate with a team of thoughtful, fast-moving, and motivated engineers. Contribute to standards that improve developer workflows, recommend best practices, and help mentor junior engineers on the team to grow their technical expertise.

Move fast while balancing quality. We can‚Äôt afford extensive processes, and we also can‚Äôt afford show-stopping bugs. We need someone who can balance speed with quality while quickly building brand-new products.

Qualifications for this role:


Minimum 10+ years of post-internship, full-time, hands-on, professional software development experience developing software in one or more front end focused programming languages; Javascript, Typescript, ES6.

Experience with one or more front-end web frameworks such as LIT, Polymer, React, Vue, or Angular with experience with CSS.

Experienced with GraphQL, REST, HTTP, Thrift basics, and the ability to design and implement maintainable APIs is a plus.

Experienced with distributed caching layers, and distributed large scale data storage systems.

Strong organizational skills, the ability to prioritize tasks and to deliver projects on schedule.

BS degree in Computer Science, a similar technical field of study or equivalent practical experience.

Entrepreneurial spirit. You are self-directed, innovative, and biased towards action in fast-paced environments. You love to build new things and thrive in ambiguity and even failure.

Excellent communication skills. You partner effectively with teams in a fully remote environment and discuss complex topics with technical and non-technical audiences.

title: Remote Voice Specialist - 34314
description:
About Turing:

Turing is an AI-powered tech services company with a mission to accelerate AGI advancement and deployment by bridging the gap between global talent from 100+ countries and the world's best foundational LLM companies by helping them improve performance through model evaluation, fine-tuning, feedback, factuality, and handling diverse data.


Role Overview:

A leading US-based technology company is seeking skilled individuals with strong English proficiency and excellent verbal communication to join an exciting AI project as Audio/Voice Annotation Trainers. You'll support the development of cutting-edge Large Language Models (LLMs) by recording audio samples, annotating voice data, and ensuring data accuracy and consistency according to detailed guidelines.


Responsibilities:

  • Record high-quality audio clearly and consistently from provided scripts and prompts.
  • Accurately annotate and label voice data for AI model training.
  • Deliver precise and uniform results across large volumes of tasks.
  • Offer feedback to help refine scripts, prompts, and training instructions.
  • Collaborate closely with QA specialists to maintain exceptional data quality.


Requirements:

  • Fluent English speaker with outstanding reading, writing, and speaking skills.
  • Familiar and comfortable with diverse regional accents.
  • Detail-oriented, able to precisely follow nuanced instructions.
  • Tech-savvy, comfortable with basic computer tools and audio file handling.
  • Analytical thinker who grasps context and intent behind scripts.
  • Professional, responsive communicator in remote team environments.
  • Self-motivated, able to independently manage tasks and responsibilities.
  • Available 20+ hours per week with daily overlap in UTC-8/PST time zone.
  • Equipped with a reliable computer, high-quality microphone, and stable internet connection.


Nice-to-Have Skills:

  • Experience with voiceover, podcasting, transcription, or linguistics.
  • Familiarity with annotation software or audio editing tools.
  • Access to advanced recording equipment.
  • Ready to influence the future of AI voice technology


Why Join Turing:

  • Innovative Projects: Directly contribute to pioneering advancements in voice-recognition AI.
  • Flexible & Remote: Fully remote contractual role with flexible hours tailored to your schedule.
  • Career Growth: Hands-on experience working with advanced AI training techniques.
  • Competitive Compensation: Fair and competitive pay reflecting your valuable skills.


Note: Shortlisted candidates may be asked to complete a brief assessment.

title: Betting Content Writer (Italy)
description:
We are seeking a skilled and detail-oriented content writer fluent in Italian to write, translate and localize sports betting news articles for the Italian version of our website. Your main focus will be adapting published content from English, Portuguese, or French into Italian‚Äîensuring journalistic quality, cultural relevance, and clarity are preserved for a local audience. To be more specific, you will:


  • Translate and adapt published news articles from English, Portuguese, or French into Italian, with support from AI tools.
  • Ensure accuracy in content, tone, and language, maintaining journalistic integrity and legal compliance in translated materials.
  • Produce various betting content formats adapted to Italian readers and to local sports preferences : news stories, betting guides, reviews, listicles, and evergreen articles.
  • Conduct thorough research on teams, players, trends, and markets to support accurate betting insights.
  • Stay current on sports betting trends, markets, rules, and legal landscape (especially in regulated jurisdictions).
  • Update and refresh existing content to reflect latest odds, stats, and promotions.
  • Publish directly into the CMS, adhering to formatting and metadata standards.
  • Collaborate with the Editor-in-Chief to meet daily or weekly content publishing targets.
  • Ensure all articles follow internal editorial guidelines, including tone, SEO, and layout.
  • Flag content that may require legal, cultural, or regional review.


The ideal profile


We're on the lookout for someone who not only shares our values and ambitions but also envisions growing alongside MoveUp Media. As a dedicated team player, you embody fair play, transparency, agility, and an unstoppable drive. You're the perfect fit for our team if you:


  • Native-level Italian fluency and excellent written English skills.
  • Proven experience as a content writer, translator, journalist, or editor, ideally in a sports or betting context.
  • Strong grasp of journalistic tone, grammar, and storytelling.
  • Familiarity with major U.S. and global sports (NFL, NBA, MLB, NHL, soccer, etc.).
  • Comfortable using AI translation tools, with an ability to edit and refine output for publication quality.


Feeling up to the task of managing the main challenges of the role, even without meeting all criteria? We're eager to hear from you! We know not all great candidates will match 100% of the above.


Next steps in the process ‚úÖ


  • 1st Interview with your future manager to make sure you meet the role‚Äôs requirements
  • 2nd interview with HR to better understand who you are and make sure there is a cultural fit with MoveUp Media
  • Last step: a proposition for us to start working together!


What‚Äôs in it for you


  • A full time remote work environment.
  • A flexible schedule and paid time off. We measure results , not hours.
  • Competitive salary, depending on your level of seniority in the role and your location
  • Development opportunities. As a startup with rapid growth, there are a lot of possibilities that can arise and we are committed to accompany our team members in their career path.
  • Yearly Workation ‚Äî a mix of work and vacation . Once a year, we find a cool place to work and have fun together.
  • 1.000‚Ç¨ / year dedicated to your professional development, wellness, sports or cultural events of your choice.


MoveUp Media

  • Ensure all articles follow internal editorial guidelines, including tone, SEO, and layout.
  • Flag content that may require legal, cultural, or regional review.


The ideal profile


We're on the lookout for someone who not only shares our values and ambitions but also envisions growing alongside MoveUp Media. As a dedicated team player, you embody fair play, transparency, agility, and an unstoppable drive. You're the perfect fit for our team if you:


  • Native-level Italian fluency and excellent written English skills.
  • Proven experience as a content writer, translator, journalist, or editor, ideally in a sports or betting context.
  • Strong grasp of journalistic tone, grammar, and storytelling.
  • Familiarity with major U.S. and global sports (NFL, NBA, MLB, NHL, soccer, etc.).
  • Comfortable using AI translation tools, with an ability to edit and refine output for publication quality.


Feeling up to the task of managing the main challenges of the role, even without meeting all criteria? We're eager to hear from you! We know not all great candidates will match 100% of the above.


Next steps in the process ‚úÖ


  • 1st Interview with your future manager to make sure you meet the role‚Äôs requirements
  • 2nd interview with HR to better understand who you are and make sure there is a cultural fit with MoveUp Media
  • Last step: a proposition for us to start working together!


What‚Äôs in it for you


  • A full time remote work environment.
  • A flexible schedule and paid time off. We measure results , not hours.
  • Competitive salary, depending on your level of seniority in the role and your location
  • Development opportunities. As a startup with rapid growth, there are a lot of possibilities that can arise and we are committed to accompany our team members in their career path.
  • Yearly Workation ‚Äî a mix of work and vacation . Once a year, we find a cool place to work and have fun together.
  • 1.000‚Ç¨ / year dedicated to your professional development, wellness, sports or cultural events of your choice.


MoveUp Media

title: US Immigration Case Manager
description:
About Us:

Robinson Immigration Law is a US immigration firm committed to helping clients achieve their American dreams through strategic legal advocacy. We focus on high skilled immigration for outstanding researchers, entrepreneurs, and professionals through visas including the EB1A, EB2 NIW, and O1A.


Position Overview:

We are seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented Case Manager with experience in EB1A (Extraordinary Ability), EB2 NIW (National Interest Waiver), or O-1A petitions. The ideal candidate will play a critical role in preparing and managing complex immigration cases and will work closely with the managing attorney and clients to ensure the highest standards of legal support. We value and respect the creativity and expertise of our Case Managers, and you would be an integral part of our team.


Responsibilities:

  • Draft, edit, and organize EB1A, O1A, and EB2 NIW petition letters, forms, and supporting documentation
  • Conduct research on clients‚Äô qualifications, industry impact, and national interest contributions
  • Prepare detailed exhibits and evidence packets demonstrating eligibility
  • Manage client communications and maintain accurate case records
  • Track case deadlines and maintain calendars to ensure timely submissions
  • Liaise with government agencies as needed to obtain necessary information or clarify requests


Qualifications:

  • Law degree
  • Ability to communicate with international clients in English
  • 1+ years of experience working on EB1A O1A, or EB2 NIW immigration cases
  • Strong writing and analytical skills; experience drafting legal support letters highly preferred
  • Proficiency with immigration case management software (e.g., eimmigration)
  • Ability to work independently and manage multiple priorities under tight deadlines
  • Exceptional attention to detail and organizational skills


Why Join Us:

  • Opportunity to work on impactful, high-stakes immigration cases
  • Supportive and collaborative team culture
  • Generous bonus system


We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Frontend Engineer with Typescript, GraphQL and FE frameworks(LIT, Polymer, React, Vue, or Angular)
description:
Title: Frontend Engineer(Typescript / GraphQL / FE frameworks)

Location: 100% Remote

Job Type: Fulltime


Qualifications for this role:

Minimum 10+ years of post-internship, full-time, hands-on, professional software development experience developing software in one or more front end focused programming languages; Javascript, Typescript, ES6.

Experience with one or more front-end web frameworks such as LIT, Polymer, React, Vue, or Angular with experience with CSS.

Experienced with GraphQL, REST, HTTP, Thrift basics, and the ability to design and implement maintainable APIs is a plus.

Experienced with distributed caching layers, and distributed large scale data storage systems.

Strong organizational skills, the ability to prioritize tasks and to deliver projects on schedule.

BS degree in Computer Science, a similar technical field of study or equivalent practical experience.

Entrepreneurial spirit. You are self-directed, innovative, and biased towards action in fast-paced environments. You love to build new things and thrive in ambiguity and even failure.

Excellent communication skills. You partner effectively with teams in a fully remote environment and discuss complex topics with technical and non-technical audiences.

Thanks

Aatmesh

title: Creative Director
description:
We‚Äôre Not Just Another Agency‚ÄîWe‚Äôre Defining the Future of Creative Performance


At Vids Agency, we‚Äôre behind some of the most innovative brands shaking up eCommerce today. From groundbreaking supplements like BronzeBites and OptiStacks to influential names like TryAuri, OutofOffice, and Neutonic, our team delivers ads that don‚Äôt just look good‚Äîthey drive explosive growth. If you‚Äôre passionate about performance-driven creativity and want to play a key role in shaping how brands dominate Meta platforms, this is your chance.


Why This Job Actually Matters


Let‚Äôs be clear: you‚Äôre not just creating beautiful ads. You‚Äôre crafting high-performance creative strategies that directly impact brand growth and profitability. You‚Äôll be leading our Meta creative strategy, owning media buying performance, and driving innovative campaigns seen by millions. If you‚Äôve ever wanted your ideas to directly affect a brand‚Äôs trajectory, here‚Äôs your opportunity.

What You‚Äôll Actually Be Doing


As our Meta Creative Director, you‚Äôll:

  • Own Creative Strategy: Develop compelling concepts, angles, and hooks specifically optimized for Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok to achieve ambitious CTR and ROAS goals.
  • Lead a Creative Powerhouse: Direct and collaborate with a talented in-house team including media buyers, video editors, motion graphics artists, and static designers, ensuring every creative piece aligns with strategic objectives.
  • Build and Manage UGC Creator Network: Source, negotiate, and manage a roster of top-tier UGC creators, crafting detailed briefs that drive exceptional content.
  • Drive Performance: Continuously analyze creative performance metrics (CTR, ROAS, scroll-stop rates, video views) using tools like AdBeacon, MotionApp, and Meta Ad Libraries to optimize content effectiveness.
  • Oversee Production Excellence: Ensure all creative outputs maintain brand consistency and meet high-quality standards, from initial concept through final execution across digital and print assets.


Who We‚Äôre Looking For

  • Proven track record in creating high-performing Meta (Facebook, Instagram, TikTok) video and static ads.
  • Exceptional creative ideation skills, with experience developing unique angles, innovative hooks, and attention-grabbing concepts.
  • Strong proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite and familiarity with other relevant editing and design tools.
  • Deep understanding of performance marketing dynamics and how creative decisions directly impact campaign success.
  • Excellent project management and communication skills‚Äîcapable of collaborating effectively with executives, media buyers, and creative teams.
  • Familiarity or willingness to quickly master tools like Slack, ClickUp, Notion, Frame.io, and Airtable.


Bonus Points If You Have:

  • Experience with direct media buying (Facebook Ads, Google Ads, TikTok Ads).
  • Proven success within the DTC supplement industry.
  • Demonstrable examples where your creative strategies directly improved ROAS.
  • Experience leveraging AI creative tools (Heygen, Veo 3, Caption.ai).


What We Offer

  • Intensive growth opportunities working directly alongside the CEO and executive team.
  • Hands-on experience shaping cutting-edge eCommerce brands in a fast-paced startup environment.
  • A culture of recognition, rapid promotion for results-driven team members, and direct mentorship from industry veterans who‚Äôve driven over $100M in sales.


Ready for Your Next Challenge?

This role isn‚Äôt for everyone. It demands someone driven, creative, and fiercely competitive‚Äîsomeone who thrives on delivering results and exceeding expectations. If you‚Äôre ready to lead groundbreaking campaigns and shape the future of creative performance marketing, we‚Äôre excited to meet you.

title: Web Designer
description:
Company Description

Step Labs is a web development and design agency that partners with 7-8 figure e-commerce brands to drive revenue growth. We focus on research-driven split tests to help ambitious founders scale their businesses efficiently. As your revenue growth partner, we build custom systems that guarantee a 30% revenue uplift within three months through weekly split-tests.


Role Description

This is a full-time remote role for a Web Designer. The Web Designer will be responsible for creating and implementing design elements for web pages, graphics, and user interfaces. The role involves collaborating with the development team to ensure designs are responsive and visually appealing across different devices. Additional tasks include maintaining design consistency, addressing client feedback, and staying updated with the latest design trends.


Qualifications

  • Proficiency in Web Design, Graphic Design, and graphics
  • Experience in Front-End Development and Responsive Web Design
  • Ability to work independently and remotely
  • Fluent English (A2+)
  • Excellent communication and teamwork skills
  • Experience with design tools such as Adobe Creative Suite and Figma
  • Bachelor's degree in Web Design, Graphic Design, Computer Science, or related field
  • Previous experience in a web development or design agency is a plus

title: Gerente de contas digitais
description:
Digital Account Manager ‚Äì Where Strategy Meets Human Impact

At Harmoney, we believe digital marketing is more than performance metrics and ad budgets ‚Äî it‚Äôs about building meaningful connections between brands and people. Every message we craft, every campaign we launch, is rooted in purpose.


To keep that purpose alive and thriving, we‚Äôre looking for a Digital Account Manager ‚Äî someone who understands that strategy is nothing without empathy, and execution means little without direction.


Why This Role Matters

As a Digital Account Manager, you're not just the "middle person" between client and creative ‚Äî you're the strategic guide that helps clients see possibilities, shape their digital voice, and grow with intention.


You're the one who ensures that what we deliver isn't just "on time" ‚Äî it's on brand, on message, and on purpose.


Your Key Responsibilities

Lead client relationships with clarity, care, and strategic foresight


Translate business objectives into holistic digital marketing plans across platforms (social, content, paid media, CRM, etc.)


Collaborate cross-functionally with creative, media, and performance teams to deliver campaigns that drive real results


Provide strategic insights and reporting that highlight both impact and direction


Be the client's partner in growth ‚Äî not just a point of contact


What We‚Äôre Looking For

3+ years of experience in managing digital marketing accounts, ideally in a creative or performance-driven agency environment


Strong grasp of digital ecosystems: from paid ads to brand storytelling to lifecycle marketing


Excellent stakeholder management skills ‚Äî able to handle complex priorities and personalities with empathy and efficiency


Confidence in communication: You speak clearly, write strategically, and listen actively


A mindset that blends structure, curiosity, and a bias for action


Work Style & Benefits

Remote | Part-time (20‚Äì25 hours/week)


Compensation: $5,000 ‚Äì $7,000/month, depending on your experience, expertise, and impact


Flexible working hours ‚Äî you own your time


Work with a diverse range of industries, teams, and business models ‚Äî no two projects are ever the same


A values-led team culture where growth, balance, and respect come first


Why Join Harmoney?

Because we‚Äôre not just building campaigns ‚Äî we‚Äôre building trust, systems, and long-term brand value.

Because we believe strategy is a craft ‚Äî and every great project starts with a great relationship.

And because we know that when the right people connect with the right purpose, the work becomes transformational ‚Äî for clients and for you.

title: Murex Support Engineer
description:
Project Description

DXC-Luxoft has one of the world's leading Solutions practices. We are a top-tier Murex Alliance Partner and a market leader in implementation, integration, upgrade and migration. We provide end-to end project services and have delivered over 200 successful Murex projects across all major asset-classes and sectors including investment banking, asset management, corporate treasury and insurance.


Whether you possess a background in finance, technology or Mathematics, your experience in the capital markets industry would be of high interest to us.


Responsibilities

- Analyze, formulate, proposed, develop and/or contribute to overall solutions as per deliverables

- Develop requirements per given stream and according with resolution needs as they come along

- Manage day-to-day assigned tasks to complete various deliverables

- Contribute to support group(s) efforts in resolving request or issues

- Liaise with respective internal team(s) to resolve issues and necessary enhancements

- Continuous follow-up of new Application developments, enhancements, version upgrade release, regulations/practices globally, and other such items

- Perform various levels of testing for assigned deliverables as well as participate in formal release cycles (SIT/UAT)


Skills Description

- 4+ years' experience with Murex functionalities

- 2+ years' experience in financial markets technology

- Hands-on experience in Murex Infra/Environment/Config Management, Back-Office Workflows, Datamart, Market Data, Batch processing, End of Day flow(s), interfaces and Trade Life Cycle

- Must have strong personality, logical and analytical skills

- Be detailed-oriented, a quick learner and self-starter

- Possess good verbal and written communication skills

- Must have strong organization skills

- Good product knowledge in IRD, CRD, EQD, COM

- Good understanding on P&L concept overall and its components

- Strong problem solving skills and attention to detail

- Strong relationship building skills both internally and externally

- Strong experience in supporting end-users and resolving their daily issues

title: Chatbot Engineer
description:
The Chatbot Engineer at Avenue Code will focus on developing and configuring conversational flows within the Google Dialogflow platform. They will be responsible for designing and implementing intents, entities, context management, and the overall dialogue logic to guide the end user. This role involves setting up webhook calls from Dialogflow to integration points (such as Cloud Functions) that will execute the business logic. The engineer will work closely with the Node.js Engineer to define and validate the interfaces/contracts for these integrations.


Essential Skills:

  • Hands-on experience in developing and configuring conversational flows in commercial platforms, with a strong preference for Google Dialogflow.
  • Deep knowledge of conversational design: intents, entities, context management, fallback handling, and response strategies.
  • Experience configuring webhook calls from Dialogflow to external services.
  • Ability to map business requirements into effective dialogue flows.
  • Capability to collaborate with back-end engineers to define API/integration contracts.


Desirable Skills:

  • Basic programming knowledge (e.g., Node.js, Python) to understand webhook logic.
  • Experience with messaging platforms, especially WhatsApp Business API.
  • Familiarity with Natural Language Processing (NLP) concepts.
  • Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP).
  • Knowledge of version control tools like Git.

title: Amazon Brand Manager
description:
Live Fraiche is a rapidly growing beauty brand on a mission to elevate and celebrate natural beauty with clean, organic skincare solutions. We believe that beauty should be nourishing, effortless, and empowering , providing women with high-quality, natural products that enhance their natural glow without harsh chemicals or complicated routines. Our journey began with a commitment to pure, effective skincare that prioritizes both beauty and wellness , and since our inception, we‚Äôve helped thousands of women feel confident in their own skin, naturally.

About the Role:


We are looking for an Amazon Brand Manager to take ownership of a function previously led by the founder. This is a high-impact role with direct access to leadership and the opportunity to shape our next phase of growth. You will report directly to the founder and you will be an integral part of our team as we embark on the next phase of our growth.


The Amazon Brand Manager is responsible for driving the overall success of the company‚Äôs products on Amazon. This includes ensuring that all product listings are active, fully optimized, and compliant with Amazon‚Äôs policies. They will maintain excellent account health, open and monitor support cases as needed, and track sales performance through regular analysis of brand analytics, keyword ranking data, and market trends to make strategic recommendations. The Brand Manager will also identify, research, and assist with successfully launching new products, while ensuring that each product maintains strong profitability.

The Brand Manager will oversee every area of product success on Amazon, identify solutions or improvements, and coordinate with multiple team members to see goals are met.

Your Role at a Glance

As the Amazon Brand Manager, you‚Äôll be at the center of our Amazon channel success. This isn‚Äôt a maintenance role. You‚Äôll actively shape strategy, uncover new growth opportunities, and lead execution across listings, performance, and profitability. You‚Äôll work cross-functionally with our founder, creative, and operations teams to scale our impact and reach.

About You:

  • You are a critical thinker who thrives on solving problems independently and resourcefully. When you don‚Äôt know something, you don‚Äôt wait, you figure it out.
  • You go beyond just managing what currently exists. You take an active role in understanding the brand, the product, the customer, and the market to make thoughtful, holistic decisions that drive real growth.
  • You constantly seek to expand your knowledge of the Amazon and eCommerce ecosystem, staying ahead of trends, tools, and tactics so you can bring innovative ideas and strategic recommendations to the table.
  • You‚Äôre not there to check boxes, you like to think critically, act decisively, and make an impact.
  • You‚Äôre forward-thinking, always looking for new ways to optimize performance, unlock growth, and scale what‚Äôs working.
  • You‚Äôre outspoken, confident, and unafraid to share new ideas or challenge the status quo. You believe in your ability to execute and aren‚Äôt hesitant to take the lead when you see an opportunity.
  • You‚Äôre a fast learner who embraces challenges and adapts quickly in a dynamic environment.
  • You take full ownership of your work, hold yourself to a high standard, and don‚Äôt require micromanagement to deliver exceptional results.
  • You‚Äôre highly organized, detail-oriented, and capable of juggling multiple moving parts while maintaining strategic focus.
  • You communicate clearly, collaborate well with others, and know when to lead, delegate, or ask for input.


Job Responsibilities:


Strategic Direction

  • Develop and execute product optimization plans that align with company revenue and profit goals and are scalable and repeatable.
  • Proactively identify opportunities for growth through split testing, gap analysis, and product performance audits.
  • Analyze data to uncover actionable insights and make informed strategic adjustments that drive performance.
  • Document and deliver clear execution plans that align with forecasted outcomes and business objectives.
  • Maintain and regularly update SOPs and documentation to ensure consistency and clarity across all processes.


Product Listing Optimization

  • Create, edit, and optimize product listings, including titles, bullet points, descriptions, and backend keywords to maximize visibility.
  • Ensure high-quality images and A+ Content that enhance customer engagement and improve conversion rates.
  • Conduct keyword research and implement SEO strategies to enhance organic ranking and search performance.


Catalog & Flat File Management

  • Manage and update the Amazon catalog, ensuring all product data is accurate and up to date.
  • Work with flat files for bulk uploads, troubleshooting listing issues, and making large-scale updates.
  • Resolve variations, suppressed listings, and other catalog errors within Amazon Seller Central.


Data Analysis & Performance Tracking

  • Monitor sales, revenue, and profitability metrics to optimize performance.
  • Track keyword ranking, conversion rates, and customer reviews to drive strategic improvements.
  • Utilize Amazon Brand Analytics, Business Reports, and third-party tools (Helium 10, Datadive, etc.) to identify growth opportunities.


Inventory & Supply Chain Coordination

  • Forecast demand to prevent stockouts or overstock situations, ensuring a steady supply of products.
  • Coordinate with suppliers and warehouses to ensure timely shipments and inventory availability.
  • Manage Amazon FBA (Fulfilled by Amazon) and FBM (Fulfilled by Merchant) logistics to maintain optimal inventory levels.


Customer Engagement & Review Management

  • Develop and implement strategies to increase customer reviews and manage negative feedback effectively.
  • Monitor and respond to customer inquiries and reviews to enhance brand reputation and customer satisfaction.
  • Maintain high customer service standards to build brand loyalty and trust.


Competitor Analysis & Market Research

  • Track competitor pricing, promotions, and strategies to stay ahead in the marketplace.
  • Conduct market research to identify trends, gaps, and new growth opportunities for Live Fraiche‚Äôs product line.
  • Stay updated on Amazon algorithm changes, policy updates, and industry best practices to maintain compliance and competitiveness.


Compliance & Brand Protection

  • Ensure compliance with Amazon‚Äôs policies and guidelines, avoiding listing suspensions or penalties.
  • Monitor and take action against hijackers, counterfeit products, and unauthorized resellers to protect brand integrity.
  • Manage Amazon Brand Registry and A+ Content, ensuring a strong brand presence and visibility.


Qualifications:

  • Bachelor‚Äôs degree in a quantitative or analytical field (e.g., engineering, mathematics, or sciences) is preferred. Degrees in business, marketing, or communications will also be considered.
  • Minimum 3 years of hands-on experience managing Amazon Seller Central, including listing optimization, catalog management, and account health.
  • Strong understanding of keyword research and Amazon SEO best practices.
  • Demonstrated ability to work autonomously and make data-driven, strategic decisions with minimal oversight.
  • Experience analyzing Amazon data and drawing actionable insights from reports, market trends, and consumer behavior.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.
  • Ability to write or contribute to creative briefs and understand brand strategy and positioning.
  • Highly organized with strong project management skills and the ability to manage multiple priorities.
  • Proficient with spreadsheets for data organization and analysis¬†


Bonus

  • Experience managing DTC e-commerce brands and working with Amazon, Shopify, and retail expansion strategies.
  • Strong knowledge of digital marketing, performance metrics, and e-commerce analytics (Google Analytics, Shopify analytics, Meta Ads, Klaviyo, etc.).
  • Any HTML, coding or website building experience



Think you‚Äôre the right fit? Apply now and tell us why you‚Äôd be excited to lead the Amazon growth at Live Fraiche. We can‚Äôt wait to meet you.

title: Amazon Brand Manager
description:
Live Fraiche is a rapidly growing beauty brand on a mission to elevate and celebrate natural beauty with clean, organic skincare solutions. We believe that beauty should be nourishing, effortless, and empowering , providing women with high-quality, natural products that enhance their natural glow without harsh chemicals or complicated routines. Our journey began with a commitment to pure, effective skincare that prioritizes both beauty and wellness , and since our inception, we‚Äôve helped thousands of women feel confident in their own skin, naturally.

About the Role:


We are looking for an Amazon Brand Manager to take ownership of a function previously led by the founder. This is a high-impact role with direct access to leadership and the opportunity to shape our next phase of growth. You will report directly to the founder and you will be an integral part of our team as we embark on the next phase of our growth.


The Amazon Brand Manager is responsible for driving the overall success of the company‚Äôs products on Amazon. This includes ensuring that all product listings are active, fully optimized, and compliant with Amazon‚Äôs policies. They will maintain excellent account health, open and monitor support cases as needed, and track sales performance through regular analysis of brand analytics, keyword ranking data, and market trends to make strategic recommendations. The Brand Manager will also identify, research, and assist with successfully launching new products, while ensuring that each product maintains strong profitability.

The Brand Manager will oversee every area of product success on Amazon, identify solutions or improvements, and coordinate with multiple team members to see goals are met.

Your Role at a Glance

As the Amazon Brand Manager, you‚Äôll be at the center of our Amazon channel success. This isn‚Äôt a maintenance role. You‚Äôll actively shape strategy, uncover new growth opportunities, and lead execution across listings, performance, and profitability. You‚Äôll work cross-functionally with our founder, creative, and operations teams to scale our impact and reach.

About You:

  • You are a critical thinker who thrives on solving problems independently and resourcefully. When you don‚Äôt know something, you don‚Äôt wait, you figure it out.
  • You go beyond just managing what currently exists. You take an active role in understanding the brand, the product, the customer, and the market to make thoughtful, holistic decisions that drive real growth.
  • You constantly seek to expand your knowledge of the Amazon and eCommerce ecosystem, staying ahead of trends, tools, and tactics so you can bring innovative ideas and strategic recommendations to the table.

  • You‚Äôre a fast learner who embraces challenges and adapts quickly in a dynamic environment.
  • You take full ownership of your work, hold yourself to a high standard, and don‚Äôt require micromanagement to deliver exceptional results.
  • You‚Äôre highly organized, detail-oriented, and capable of juggling multiple moving parts while maintaining strategic focus.
  • You communicate clearly, collaborate well with others, and know when to lead, delegate, or ask for input.


Job Responsibilities:


Strategic Direction

  • Develop and execute product optimization plans that align with company revenue and profit goals and are scalable and repeatable.
  • Proactively identify opportunities for growth through split testing, gap analysis, and product performance audits.
  • Analyze data to uncover actionable insights and make informed strategic adjustments that drive performance.
  • Document and deliver clear execution plans that align with forecasted outcomes and business objectives.
  • Maintain and regularly update SOPs and documentation to ensure consistency and clarity across all processes.


Product Listing Optimization

  • Create, edit, and optimize product listings, including titles, bullet points, descriptions, and backend keywords to maximize visibility.
  • Ensure high-quality images and A+ Content that enhance customer engagement and improve conversion rates.

Catalog & Flat File Management

  • Manage and update the Amazon catalog, ensuring all product data is accurate and up to date.
  • Work with flat files for bulk uploads, troubleshooting listing issues, and making large-scale updates.
  • Resolve variations, suppressed listings, and other catalog errors within Amazon Seller Central.


Data Analysis & Performance Tracking

  • Monitor sales, revenue, and profitability metrics to optimize performance.
  • Track keyword ranking, conversion rates, and customer reviews to drive strategic improvements.
  • Utilize Amazon Brand Analytics, Business Reports, and third-party tools (Helium 10, Datadive, etc.) to identify growth opportunities.


Inventory & Supply Chain Coordination

  • Forecast demand to prevent stockouts or overstock situations, ensuring a steady supply of products.
  • Coordinate with suppliers and warehouses to ensure timely shipments and inventory availability.
  • Manage Amazon FBA (Fulfilled by Amazon) and FBM (Fulfilled by Merchant) logistics to maintain optimal inventory levels.


Customer Engagement & Review Management

  • Develop and implement strategies to increase customer reviews and manage negative feedback effectively.
  • Monitor and respond to customer inquiries and reviews to enhance brand reputation and customer satisfaction.
  • Maintain high customer service standards to build brand loyalty and trust.


Competitor Analysis & Market Research

  • Track competitor pricing, promotions, and strategies to stay ahead in the marketplace.
  • Conduct market research to identify trends, gaps, and new growth opportunities for Live Fraiche‚Äôs product line.
  • Stay updated on Amazon algorithm changes, policy updates, and industry best practices to maintain compliance and competitiveness.


Compliance & Brand Protection

  • Ensure compliance with Amazon‚Äôs policies and guidelines, avoiding listing suspensions or penalties.
  • Monitor and take action against hijackers, counterfeit products, and unauthorized resellers to protect brand integrity.
  • Manage Amazon Brand Registry and A+ Content, ensuring a strong brand presence and visibility.


Qualifications:

  • Bachelor‚Äôs degree in a quantitative or analytical field (e.g., engineering, mathematics, or sciences) is preferred. Degrees in business, marketing, or communications will also be considered.
  • Minimum 3 years of hands-on experience managing Amazon Seller Central, including listing optimization, catalog management, and account health.
  • Strong understanding of keyword research and Amazon SEO best practices.
  • Demonstrated ability to work autonomously and make data-driven, strategic decisions with minimal oversight.
  • Experience analyzing Amazon data and drawing actionable insights from reports, market trends, and consumer behavior.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.
  • Ability to write or contribute to creative briefs and understand brand strategy and positioning.
  • Highly organized with strong project management skills and the ability to manage multiple priorities.
  • Proficient with spreadsheets for data organization and analysis¬†


Bonus

  • Experience managing DTC e-commerce brands and working with Amazon, Shopify, and retail expansion strategies.
  • Strong knowledge of digital marketing, performance metrics, and e-commerce analytics (Google Analytics, Shopify analytics, Meta Ads, Klaviyo, etc.).
  • Any HTML, coding or website building experience

title: Betting Content Writer (Italy)
description:
We are seeking a skilled and detail-oriented content writer fluent in Italian to write, translate and localize sports betting news articles for the Italian version of our website. Your main focus will be adapting published content from English, Portuguese, or French into Italian‚Äîensuring journalistic quality, cultural relevance, and clarity are preserved for a local audience. To be more specific, you will:


  • Translate and adapt published news articles from English, Portuguese, or French into Italian, with support from AI tools.
  • Ensure accuracy in content, tone, and language, maintaining journalistic integrity and legal compliance in translated materials.
  • Produce various betting content formats adapted to Italian readers and to local sports preferences : news stories, betting guides, reviews, listicles, and evergreen articles.
  • Conduct thorough research on teams, players, trends, and markets to support accurate betting insights.
  • Stay current on sports betting trends, markets, rules, and legal landscape (especially in regulated jurisdictions).
  • Update and refresh existing content to reflect latest odds, stats, and promotions.
  • Publish directly into the CMS, adhering to formatting and metadata standards.
  • Collaborate with the Editor-in-Chief to meet daily or weekly content publishing targets.
  • Ensure all articles follow internal editorial guidelines, including tone, SEO, and layout.
  • Flag content that may require legal, cultural, or regional review.


The ideal profile


We're on the lookout for someone who not only shares our values and ambitions but also envisions growing alongside MoveUp Media. As a dedicated team player, you embody fair play, transparency, agility, and an unstoppable drive. You're the perfect fit for our team if you:


  • Native-level Italian fluency and excellent written English skills.
  • Proven experience as a content writer, translator, journalist, or editor, ideally in a sports or betting context.
  • Strong grasp of journalistic tone, grammar, and storytelling.
  • Familiarity with major U.S. and global sports (NFL, NBA, MLB, NHL, soccer, etc.).
  • Comfortable using AI translation tools, with an ability to edit and refine output for publication quality.


Feeling up to the task of managing the main challenges of the role, even without meeting all criteria? We're eager to hear from you! We know not all great candidates will match 100% of the above.


Next steps in the process ‚úÖ


  • 1st Interview with your future manager to make sure you meet the role‚Äôs requirements
  • 2nd interview with HR to better understand who you are and make sure there is a cultural fit with MoveUp Media
  • Last step: a proposition for us to start working together!


What‚Äôs in it for you


  • A full time remote work environment.
  • A flexible schedule and paid time off. We measure results , not hours.
  • Competitive salary, depending on your level of seniority in the role and your location
  • Development opportunities. As a startup with rapid growth, there are a lot of possibilities that can arise and we are committed to accompany our team members in their career path.
  • Yearly Workation ‚Äî a mix of work and vacation . Once a year, we find a cool place to work and have fun together.
  • 1.000‚Ç¨ / year dedicated to your professional development, wellness, sports or cultural events of your choice.


MoveUp Media

title: Retention Specialist
description:
About Hearth


Hearth is a Fintech company helping home improvement contractors grow and manage their business. Our SaaS platform provides over 14,000 contractors the financial tools they need to close more business, including financing solutions, invoicing, payment collections, insurance products, all in one, modern system designed specifically for the home improvement industry.

Backed by 8VC, Founders Fund, and other prominent leaders in Silicon Valley, Hearth has raised over $50M and is one of the fastest growing companies in the home improvement space.


The Mission


To us, the home improvement contractor is a true embodiment of the American Dream ‚Äì skilled craftspeople who choose to start their own business to build a better life for their families and their communities.


While home improvement professionals power a $500 billion per year industry and protect the homes of millions of Americans, they are typically overlooked by Wall Street and Silicon Valley, and are one of the most underserved, undercapitalized, and written-off segments of entrepreneurs.


We built Hearth to tip the odds of success in their favor. Hearth is a seamless digital toolkit that helps home improvement pros win more projects, grow their sales, and save time running their business. In the last six years, we‚Äôve built an industry-leading technology platform (Financing, Payments, Quotes, Contracts, and Banking), work with over 15,000 contractors, and have funded over $500 million in additional projects for home improvement pros. And, we are just getting started.


The Opportunity:


As a Retention Specialist at Hearth, you will play a critical role in our Customer Success team, focusing on managing inbound cancellations, running retention initiatives, and driving revenue growth. Your mission is to deeply understand our customers' needs, address their concerns, and use all available resources to retain their business. This role is ideal for someone who is motivated by results, resilient in challenging situations, and passionate about helping businesses succeed.


Why This Opportunity is Exciting:


The ideal candidate for this role is someone who is eager to leverage their unique skills to significantly impact the customer experience while developing their career and expanding their influence within the company. This opportunity is not just a job‚Äîit's a chance to use your strengths to transform customer retention and influence the overall direction of how we assist our customers. You will have the ability to shape the top of the funnel through detailed data collection and reporting, becoming a pivotal member of the company. Your efforts will be recognized as key to driving rapid company growth, and you‚Äôll be compensated based on your results, similar to a sales rep. This is a role where your contributions truly matter.


What We're Looking For:


We‚Äôre searching for someone who‚Äôs got a natural knack for sales‚Äîyou know how to ask the right questions, dig deep, and truly understand what‚Äôs bothering our customers. You‚Äôre the type of person who doesn‚Äôt just stop at the surface but uses every tool at your disposal to find solutions that work. Cold calls? Tough conversations? They don‚Äôt scare you. In fact, you thrive in those moments, staying cool and collected no matter how challenging things get.

Curiosity is in your DNA. You‚Äôre genuinely interested in our customers and passionate about helping them succeed. When the going gets tough, you don‚Äôt shy away; instead, you roll up your sleeves and get the job done, no matter what it takes. Doing the right thing is important to you‚Äîeven if it‚Äôs not the easiest or most popular choice.

You‚Äôre hungry for results and not just here to clock in and out. You‚Äôre driven to make a real impact, and you see your performance as the key to controlling your own income. And let‚Äôs be honest‚Äîyou‚Äôre ambitious. You‚Äôre always looking for ways to grow, improve, and move up in your career.


What you‚Äôll do: :


  • Customer Engagement: Proactively reach out to customers who have requested cancellations or expressed dissatisfaction. Listen to their concerns, identify pain points, and offer personalized solutions to retain their business.
  • Issue Resolution: Address and resolve customer issues in a timely and effective manner. Collaborate with internal teams to ensure that all customer concerns are fully resolved and documented.
  • Retention Strategies: Develop and implement tailored retention strategies for different customer segments, utilizing data and customer feedback to continuously improve these approaches.
  • Renewal Assistance: Assist customers with the renewal process, ensuring they fully understand the value of our services and the benefits of continuing their relationship with us.
  • Reporting & Analytics: Track and report on retention metrics, customer feedback, and the effectiveness of retention strategies. Provide insights and recommendations to the Retention Manager.
  • Product Knowledge: Stay up-to-date on all product features, updates, and industry trends to effectively communicate the value proposition to customers.
  • Collaboration: Work closely with the Sales, Product, and Customer Success teams to share insights and ensure a cohesive approach to customer retention.
  • Upsell & Cross-Sell: Identify upsell and cross-sell opportunities that align with customer needs, contributing to revenue growth.


Qualifications:


  • 2+ years of experience in customer service, sales, or a related field.
  • Strong foundation in customer-facing roles with excellent communication and active listening skills.
  • Proven track record of meeting or exceeding quotas/KPIs.
  • Experience with Salesforce or similar CRM systems.
  • Ability to handle high-volume, fast-paced phone interactions with resilience.
  • Problem-solving and conflict resolution skills.
  • Adaptability to a fast-changing environment with attention to detail and consistent follow-through.
  • Customer-centric mindset with a genuine desire to help businesses succeed.


Preferred:


  • Experience in the Home Improvement/Construction vertical or adjacent fields


Our Core Values


  • Truth. We value honesty and data. We seek to understand what is reality, so we can effectively respond to it.
  • Slope. Rate of change over time. We hire and reward based on a team member‚Äôs potential, capacity, and growth-mindset, rather than a fancy resume.
  • Mutual Benefit. The best outcomes happen when everyone wins - customers, team members, and the company. We seek to understand each other‚Äôs aspirations and create alignment to get there.
  • Competitive Greatness. We desire an opportunity and environment from which to pull the greatest versions of ourselves out into the world, rather than just a ‚Äújob‚Äù.


At Hearth, we value resilience, curiosity, and a strong drive for results. We recognize that retention can be challenging, but we believe in the power of addressing each customer's unique needs. If you're excited about making a real difference in how businesses operate and grow, we want to hear from you!

title: Senior Engineer (Python)
description:
We are seeking to bring on board a Python Senior Engineer. You will be responsible for leading the development of web applications using Django and PostgreSQL. You‚Äôll work on both the front-end and back-end, focusing on delivering efficient, scalable, and robust solutions. This role requires deep expertise in full-stack development, with a strong focus on Python, Django, and relational databases like PostgreSQL.


Responsibilities


  • Exceptional problem solving skills to identify and solve complex technical issues efficiently.
  • Communicates effectively with team members, stakeholders and non-technical persons and also collaborates well within a team, sharing knowledge and mentoring junior developers.
  • Shows a strong commitment to learning and staying up to date with emerging technologies and industry trends.
  • Development and maintenance of web applications using Python/Django and PostgreSQL.
  • Collaborate with front-end developers, UI/UX designers, and other team members to ensure seamless integration between the front-end and back-end.
  • Build efficient, reusable, and scalable code while following best practices for security and performance.
  • Optimize database queries and ensure data integrity through well-structured schemas and indexing in PostgreSQL.
  • Develop RESTful APIs to power front-end applications and third-party integrations.
  • Mentor junior developers and provide technical guidance to the team.
  • Participate in code reviews, testing, and debugging to ensure the quality of the applications.


Technology Requirements


  • 4+ years of professional experience in full-stack web development with a strong emphasis on Python.
  • Extensive knowledge of the Django framework, including ORM, authentication, middleware, and best practices.
  • Proven experience diagnosing and improving performance issues in existing Django ORM implementations, including query optimization and refactoring inefficient code.
  • Proficiency in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and experience with front-end libraries/frameworks (e.g., React, Vue.js, or Angular).
  • Deep experience with PostgreSQL, including writing complex SQL queries, managing database schema, performance tuning, and backup strategies.
  • Experience in building and integrating RESTful APIs.
  • Experience deploying and managing web applications on cloud services (e.g., AWS, GCP, or Azure) and using CI/CD pipelines.
  • Strong communication and teamwork skills, with a willingness to mentor and learn from others.
  • Experience working in an Agile/Scrum environment.
  • We value engineers who embrace AI-assisted development and are passionate about pushing the boundaries of what AI can do in the coding process.

title: Creative Director
description:
We‚Äôre Not Just Another Agency‚ÄîWe‚Äôre Defining the Future of Creative Performance


At Vids Agency, we‚Äôre behind some of the most innovative brands shaking up eCommerce today. From groundbreaking supplements like BronzeBites and OptiStacks to influential names like TryAuri, OutofOffice, and Neutonic, our team delivers ads that don‚Äôt just look good‚Äîthey drive explosive growth. If you‚Äôre passionate about performance-driven creativity and want to play a key role in shaping how brands dominate Meta platforms, this is your chance.


Why This Job Actually Matters


Let‚Äôs be clear: you‚Äôre not just creating beautiful ads. You‚Äôre crafting high-performance creative strategies that directly impact brand growth and profitability. You‚Äôll be leading our Meta creative strategy, owning media buying performance, and driving innovative campaigns seen by millions. If you‚Äôve ever wanted your ideas to directly affect a brand‚Äôs trajectory, here‚Äôs your opportunity.

What You‚Äôll Actually Be Doing


As our Meta Creative Director, you‚Äôll:

  • Own Creative Strategy: Develop compelling concepts, angles, and hooks specifically optimized for Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok to achieve ambitious CTR and ROAS goals.
  • Lead a Creative Powerhouse: Direct and collaborate with a talented in-house team including media buyers, video editors, motion graphics artists, and static designers, ensuring every creative piece aligns with strategic objectives.
  • Build and Manage UGC Creator Network: Source, negotiate, and manage a roster of top-tier UGC creators, crafting detailed briefs that drive exceptional content.
  • Drive Performance: Continuously analyze creative performance metrics (CTR, ROAS, scroll-stop rates, video views) using tools like AdBeacon, MotionApp, and Meta Ad Libraries to optimize content effectiveness.
  • Oversee Production Excellence: Ensure all creative outputs maintain brand consistency and meet high-quality standards, from initial concept through final execution across digital and print assets.


Who We‚Äôre Looking For

  • Proven track record in creating high-performing Meta (Facebook, Instagram, TikTok) video and static ads.
  • Exceptional creative ideation skills, with experience developing unique angles, innovative hooks, and attention-grabbing concepts.
  • Strong proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite and familiarity with other relevant editing and design tools.
  • Deep understanding of performance marketing dynamics and how creative decisions directly impact campaign success.
  • Excellent project management and communication skills‚Äîcapable of collaborating effectively with executives, media buyers, and creative teams.
  • Familiarity or willingness to quickly master tools like Slack, ClickUp, Notion, Frame.io, and Airtable.


Bonus Points If You Have:

  • Experience with direct media buying (Facebook Ads, Google Ads, TikTok Ads).
  • Proven success within the DTC supplement industry.
  • Demonstrable examples where your creative strategies directly improved ROAS.
  • Experience leveraging AI creative tools (Heygen, Veo 3, Caption.ai).


What We Offer

  • Intensive growth opportunities working directly alongside the CEO and executive team.
  • Hands-on experience shaping cutting-edge eCommerce brands in a fast-paced startup environment.
  • A culture of recognition, rapid promotion for results-driven team members, and direct mentorship from industry veterans who‚Äôve driven over $100M in sales.


Ready for Your Next Challenge?

This role isn‚Äôt for everyone. It demands someone driven, creative, and fiercely competitive‚Äîsomeone who thrives on delivering results and exceeding expectations. If you‚Äôre ready to lead groundbreaking campaigns and shape the future of creative performance marketing, we‚Äôre excited to meet you.

title: Amazon Brand Manager
description:
Live Fraiche is a rapidly growing beauty brand on a mission to elevate and celebrate natural beauty with clean, organic skincare solutions. We believe that beauty should be nourishing, effortless, and empowering , providing women with high-quality, natural products that enhance their natural glow without harsh chemicals or complicated routines. Our journey began with a commitment to pure, effective skincare that prioritizes both beauty and wellness , and since our inception, we‚Äôve helped thousands of women feel confident in their own skin, naturally.

About the Role:


We are looking for an Amazon Brand Manager to take ownership of a function previously led by the founder. This is a high-impact role with direct access to leadership and the opportunity to shape our next phase of growth. You will report directly to the founder and you will be an integral part of our team as we embark on the next phase of our growth.


The Amazon Brand Manager is responsible for driving the overall success of the company‚Äôs products on Amazon. This includes ensuring that all product listings are active, fully optimized, and compliant with Amazon‚Äôs policies. They will maintain excellent account health, open and monitor support cases as needed, and track sales performance through regular analysis of brand analytics, keyword ranking data, and market trends to make strategic recommendations. The Brand Manager will also identify, research, and assist with successfully launching new products, while ensuring that each product maintains strong profitability.

The Brand Manager will oversee every area of product success on Amazon, identify solutions or improvements, and coordinate with multiple team members to see goals are met.

Your Role at a Glance

As the Amazon Brand Manager, you‚Äôll be at the center of our Amazon channel success. This isn‚Äôt a maintenance role. You‚Äôll actively shape strategy, uncover new growth opportunities, and lead execution across listings, performance, and profitability. You‚Äôll work cross-functionally with our founder, creative, and operations teams to scale our impact and reach.

About You:

  • You are a critical thinker who thrives on solving problems independently and resourcefully. When you don‚Äôt know something, you don‚Äôt wait, you figure it out.
  • You go beyond just managing what currently exists. You take an active role in understanding the brand, the product, the customer, and the market to make thoughtful, holistic decisions that drive real growth.
  • You constantly seek to expand your knowledge of the Amazon and eCommerce ecosystem, staying ahead of trends, tools, and tactics so you can bring innovative ideas and strategic recommendations to the table.
  • You‚Äôre not there to check boxes, you like to think critically, act decisively, and make an impact.
  • You‚Äôre forward-thinking, always looking for new ways to optimize performance, unlock growth, and scale what‚Äôs working.
  • You‚Äôre outspoken, confident, and unafraid to share new ideas or challenge the status quo. You believe in your ability to execute and aren‚Äôt hesitant to take the lead when you see an opportunity.
  • You‚Äôre a fast learner who embraces challenges and adapts quickly in a dynamic environment.
  • You take full ownership of your work, hold yourself to a high standard, and don‚Äôt require micromanagement to deliver exceptional results.
  • You‚Äôre highly organized, detail-oriented, and capable of juggling multiple moving parts while maintaining strategic focus.
  • You communicate clearly, collaborate well with others, and know when to lead, delegate, or ask for input.


Job Responsibilities:


Strategic Direction

  • Develop and execute product optimization plans that align with company revenue and profit goals and are scalable and repeatable.
  • Proactively identify opportunities for growth through split testing, gap analysis, and product performance audits.
  • Analyze data to uncover actionable insights and make informed strategic adjustments that drive performance.
  • Document and deliver clear execution plans that align with forecasted outcomes and business objectives.
  • Maintain and regularly update SOPs and documentation to ensure consistency and clarity across all processes.


Product Listing Optimization

  • Create, edit, and optimize product listings, including titles, bullet points, descriptions, and backend keywords to maximize visibility.
  • Ensure high-quality images and A+ Content that enhance customer engagement and improve conversion rates.
  • Conduct keyword research and implement SEO strategies to enhance organic ranking and search performance.


Catalog & Flat File Management

  • Manage and update the Amazon catalog, ensuring all product data is accurate and up to date.
  • Work with flat files for bulk uploads, troubleshooting listing issues, and making large-scale updates.
  • Resolve variations, suppressed listings, and other catalog errors within Amazon Seller Central.


Data Analysis & Performance Tracking

  • Monitor sales, revenue, and profitability metrics to optimize performance.
  • Track keyword ranking, conversion rates, and customer reviews to drive strategic improvements.
  • Utilize Amazon Brand Analytics, Business Reports, and third-party tools (Helium 10, Datadive, etc.) to identify growth opportunities.


Inventory & Supply Chain Coordination

  • Forecast demand to prevent stockouts or overstock situations, ensuring a steady supply of products.
  • Coordinate with suppliers and warehouses to ensure timely shipments and inventory availability.
  • Manage Amazon FBA (Fulfilled by Amazon) and FBM (Fulfilled by Merchant) logistics to maintain optimal inventory levels.


Customer Engagement & Review Management

  • Develop and implement strategies to increase customer reviews and manage negative feedback effectively.
  • Monitor and respond to customer inquiries and reviews to enhance brand reputation and customer satisfaction.
  • Maintain high customer service standards to build brand loyalty and trust.


Competitor Analysis & Market Research

  • Track competitor pricing, promotions, and strategies to stay ahead in the marketplace.
  • Conduct market research to identify trends, gaps, and new growth opportunities for Live Fraiche‚Äôs product line.
  • Stay updated on Amazon algorithm changes, policy updates, and industry best practices to maintain compliance and competitiveness.


Compliance & Brand Protection

  • Ensure compliance with Amazon‚Äôs policies and guidelines, avoiding listing suspensions or penalties.
  • Monitor and take action against hijackers, counterfeit products, and unauthorized resellers to protect brand integrity.
  • Manage Amazon Brand Registry and A+ Content, ensuring a strong brand presence and visibility.


Qualifications:

  • Bachelor‚Äôs degree in a quantitative or analytical field (e.g., engineering, mathematics, or sciences) is preferred. Degrees in business, marketing, or communications will also be considered.
  • Minimum 3 years of hands-on experience managing Amazon Seller Central, including listing optimization, catalog management, and account health.
  • Strong understanding of keyword research and Amazon SEO best practices.
  • Demonstrated ability to work autonomously and make data-driven, strategic decisions with minimal oversight.
  • Experience analyzing Amazon data and drawing actionable insights from reports, market trends, and consumer behavior.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.
  • Ability to write or contribute to creative briefs and understand brand strategy and positioning.
  • Highly organized with strong project management skills and the ability to manage multiple priorities.
  • Proficient with spreadsheets for data organization and analysis¬†


Bonus

  • Experience managing DTC e-commerce brands and working with Amazon, Shopify, and retail expansion strategies.
  • Strong knowledge of digital marketing, performance metrics, and e-commerce analytics (Google Analytics, Shopify analytics, Meta Ads, Klaviyo, etc.).
  • Any HTML, coding or website building experience



Think you‚Äôre the right fit? Apply now and tell us why you‚Äôd be excited to lead the Amazon growth at Live Fraiche. We can‚Äôt wait to meet you.

title: Ecommerce Growth Marketing Paid Media Specialist
description:
We are a DTC Ecommerce Growth Consulting & Marketing Company focused on helping service businesses attract, engage, and convert their ideal audience.

Our Mission: to help DTC ecommerce companies grow holistically

Our Vision: We imagine a world where service businesses never have to worry about meeting revenue goals, attracting consistent quality customers, retaining customers, or maintaining and growing their overall online presence.


Our Values:

- Treat others the way we want to be treated

- Pay close attention to detail¬†

- Don't neglect the small things, they matter

- Think critically and be a problem solver, not a problem creator

- Confidence and determination to achieve our vision.


Who We Are Looking For:


We are looking for an ecommerce Paid Media Specialist who has experience managing large ad budgets across Meta and Google primarily. (Ideally over 1 million dollars USD per month).


The candidate selected for this role would come in and manage the Meta, Google, and/or TikTok ad accounts for US based ecommerce brands. We have a lot of high-profile ecommerce clients that we work with and we are looking for a seasoned Paid Media Specialist who can produce high quality results for our clients.


The right candidate will be task-oriented, analytical, and willing to keep the team and ad accounts on pace to make sure we are meeting or exceeding client expectations. A self-starter who can see problems and go to work fixing them and not be just an order taker. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in managing Facebook Ads and Google Ads for US based ecommerce brands.


Must have a portfolio of work that demonstrates the results that you have been able to provide and the KPIs you have hit. Must also demonstrate your skills with creative testing through media buying on Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok ads.


Responsibilities

  • Manage the Meta, Google, and/or TikTok ad accounts of US based ecommerce brands
  • Run ad campaigns across Meta, Google, and TikTok
  • Monitor ROAS, ad budgets, revenue, and core KPIs to optimize campaigns and achieve the desired results for our clients
  • Run profitable creative testing campaigns and identify trends to be able to communicate with the client what is working and what we should be creating more of
  • Create performance marketing reports for the accounts that you are managing to accurately display the analytics, results, and next steps
  • Strategize on ways to improve the overall marketing strategy for our brands to increase effectiveness
  • Maintain awareness of current industry and technology standards, social media, competitive landscape, and market trends


Qualifications & Experience

  • Bachelor's degree in Marketing or related field OR 3-4 years of experience OR alternative education experience (mentors or courses)
  • Prior experience working for an ecommerce brand or advertising agency is preferred
  • Must be proficient in Facebook & Google Ads management for ecommerce brands
  • Must be proficient in scaling ad budgets
  • Strong communication, conceptual thinking, and a hunger to always provide great results for our clients
  • Autonomous worker with an analytical mind
  • Portfolio of work, results, or case studies
  • You should be comfortable using some internal communication tools such as Monday.com, Google Drive, Zoom, and Slack for team meetings and to support other team members with any technical request. Experience with Monday.com or Asana is not required but please let us know if you have used it before or not.
  • You should also be confident enough to push back on the leadership team and express your opinion if you think the ship is heading off course. We encourage that.

title: Senior DevOps Engineer
description:
About Our Client

Our client is a Gartner-recognized leader in AI security and AI TRiSM solutions. They help organizations across sectors such as pharmaceuticals, healthcare, logistics, finance, and tourism to build, deploy, and monitor AI systems with best-in-class security and compliance. They are looking for a Senior DevOps Engineer to join their platform team as they scale their security-first infrastructure to support hybrid, cloud, and on-premise deployments of machine-learning workloads‚Äîincluding large language models.


Role Overview

As a Senior DevOps Engineer, you will design, build, and maintain the end-to-end infrastructure that powers our client‚Äôs AI security platform. You'll collaborate closely with data scientists, ML engineers, and security architects to ensure that environments are scalable, reliable, and compliant with industry best practices.

This is a hands-on role that includes architecting containerized pipelines, automating deployments, and monitoring production workloads, particularly those supporting mission-critical LLM deployments.


Core Responsibilities


Containerization & Orchestration

  • Lead Docker image design and hardening for AI workloads.
  • Operate and optimize Kubernetes clusters (EKS, AKS, GKE) in hybrid and on-premise settings.

Customer-Facing Demos, Deployments & Training

  • Deploy AI security solutions into customers‚Äô private cloud environments, managing end-to-end implementation for both PoC and production.
  • Deliver comprehensive training including hands-on workshops, documentation, and video tutorials for both technical and non-technical users.

CI/CD & Release Management

  • Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, GitLab CI, Azure DevOps) with automated testing, security scans, and canary deployments.
  • Enforce Git-based workflows, including branching strategies, pull-request reviews, and artifact versioning.

Monitoring, Logging & Alerting

  • Design observability stacks using Datadog, ELK/EFK; integrate metrics, logs, and traces.
  • Implement SLIs/SLOs and set up automated alerts to maintain 99.9% uptime.

Security & Compliance

  • Collaborate with security teams to implement practices like network segmentation, IAM policies, secrets management, and vulnerability scanning.
  • Document and enforce compliance controls aligned with SOC 2, GDPR, HIPAA, and other regulatory frameworks.

Collaboration & Mentorship

  • Serve as a technical leader by mentoring junior engineers, conducting architecture reviews, and driving DevOps best practices in an Agile/Scrum environment.
  • Communicate complex infrastructure concepts clearly to cross-functional stakeholders.


Must-Have Qualifications

  • 5+ years of experience in DevOps, SRE, or related roles.
  • Deep expertise in Docker and Kubernetes (EKS, AKS, or GKE).
  • Strong cloud knowledge: AWS, Azure, or GCP‚Äîespecially with hybrid and on-premise environments.
  • Hands-on experience with CI/CD tools like Jenkins, GitLab CI, or Azure DevOps.
  • Proficient in monitoring tools (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK/EFK) and defining SLIs/SLOs.
  • Strong Linux and scripting skills (Bash, Python).
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills in Agile/Scrum environments.


Nice-to-Have Skills

  • Experience with LLM deployment tools (e.g., VLLM, Ollama).
  • Knowledge of service mesh technologies (Istio, Linkerd).
  • Familiarity with serverless (AWS Lambda, Azure Functions).
  • Exposure to SQL (PostgreSQL, MySQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB, Cassandra).
  • Advanced IaC experience: Terraform, CloudFormation, and policy-as-code.


What Our Client Offers

  • Competitive salary + performance-based bonus (5‚Äì20%).
  • Equity in a fast-growing, Gartner-recognized AI security startup.
  • Fully remote work environment with flexible hours.
  • Generous professional development and conference budget.
  • A collaborative culture where your contributions shape the future of secure AI.

title: Manual QA Specialist ‚Äì US Real Estate Market
description:
Sphere partners with Clients to transform their organizations, embed technology and process into everything they do, and enable lasting competitive advantage. We combine global expertise and local insight to help people and companies turn their ambitious goals into reality. At Sphere we put people first and strive to be a changemaker by building a better future through innovation and technology. Sphere is helping a known multinational company to innovate and bring new platforms to market and is looking for a Manual QA Specialist who will join our team.


Location: Remote (must have 100% overlap with US time zone)

Type: Contract

Engagement: Part-time with potential to grow into full-time, long-term role


About the Role:

We‚Äôre looking for a Manual QA Specialist to support the quality assurance process for a real estate technology platform serving in the U.S. to assist in testing new integrations and gradually transition into a customer-facing support role. Initially focused on manual Quality Assurance, this position will play a key role in ensuring the successful rollout of new features and products. Over time, responsibilities will shift toward providing support and guidance to end-users.


Key Responsibilities:


  • Execute manual testing for new features, workflows, and integrations (e.g. BI tools like SiSense);
  • Identify, document, and help resolve bugs and usability issues;
  • Collaborate with product and development teams to ensure timely fixes and improvements;
  • Create and maintain clear test cases and documentation;
  • Learn and understand real estate and mortgage workflows to validate real-world scenarios;
  • Provide occasional feedback on product usability from a customer perspective.


What We‚Äôre Looking For:


  • 5+ years of experience in manual QA testing is a must;
  • Ability to work independently in a remote environment with U.S. time zone availability;
  • Prior experience with SaaS platforms or tech solutions in real estate;
  • Excellent attention to detail and ability to document findings clearly;
  • Willingness to learn about the U.S. real estate industry;
  • Upper-Intermediate English (written and spoken) is a must.
